C1 C2 C3 C4 C5 C6 C7 C8 C9 C10 C11 C12 C13 C14 C15 C16 C17 C18 C19 C20 C21 C22 C23 C24 C25 C26 C27 C28 C29 C30 C31 C32 C33 C34 C35 C36 C37 C38 C39 C40 C41 C42 C43 C44 C45 C46 C47 C48 C49 C50 C51 C52 C53 C54 C55 C56 C57 C58 C59 C60 C61 C62 C63 C64 C65 C66 C67 C68 C69 C70 C71 C72 C73 C74 C75 C76 C77 C78 C79 C80 C81 C82 C83 C84 C85 C86 C87 C88 C89 C90 C91 C92 C93 C94 C95 C96 C97 C98 C99 C100 C101 C102 C103 C104 C105 C106 C107 C108 C109 C110 C111 C112 C113 C114 C115 C116 C117 C118 C119 C120 C121 C122 C123 C124 C125 C126 C127 C128 C129 C130 C131 C132 C133 C134 C135 C136 C137 C138 C139 C140 C141 C142 C143 C144 C145 C146 C147 C148 C149 C150

ESFM v0.5 PSA

Note: This is still a very early look into the unfinished text of the Open English Translation of the Bible. Please double-check the text in advance before using in public. Some things (like capitalisation of “him” referring to Jesus or “father” referring to God) in the RV haven’t been decided yet so we’re still testing both ways.

Note: The Readers’ Version on the left is a translation into contemporary English aimed at the person on the street who hasn’t necessarily been brought up with exposure to Biblical jargon and/or 16th century English. It’s designed to be used alongside the Literal Version on the right which gives the English reader a window into what’s actually written in the original languages. (See the introduction for more details—we recommend that you read the introduction first if you’re wanting to fully understand the Literal Version.) By comparing the left and right columns, you should be able to easily get the message of the text, while at the same time keeping an eye on what it was actually translated from.

Psalms

It is our prayer that the Open English Translation of the Bible will give you clear understanding of the accounts and messages written by the God-inspired Biblical writers.

Introduction

The Psalm, sabeka this immanlimud me ulahingen, me duma pad again me ulahingen, me balak, and me praying. Inggamit sika te keet-etawan te Israel te pegsimba ran. Nataman, intimul ran e this diye te me Kasulatan dan.

Masulug klasi te this epad te egmalintutuu te God: due me ulahingen te pegsaye and pegsimba te God, due me praying te egpabulig, and te kaluwasan, pegbuyu te pasaylu, ulahingen te egpasalamat te pegpanalangin te God, and me peghangyu egdusaan ka me kuntere dan. This me praying neelin for te senge-person and for te intiru inged; ka duma, migpakita te peg-ealig te person, ka duma, migpanengneng te me keilangan and peggeyinawa te langun keet-etawan te God.

Inggamit of Jesus ka me ulahingen, inlagkes isulat te me talagsulat te Iyam Panugtulen, and intumpisan e this baseen te pegsimba te Simbaan te Migmalintutuu puun te pegbunsud.

Main components of this “book”

The sabeka gatus and lalimma pulu (150) me ulahingen, imbaad te lalimma baad and ke baseen naa:

Psa. (1–41)

Psalm (42–72)

Psalm (73–89)

Psalm (90–106)

Psalm (107–150)

Te this baseen, due sabeka gatus and lalimma pulu (150) me ulahingen and me praying inggamit te me Hebrews te pegsimba ran. Eggamiten dan sika te pegsimba ran diye te kasuluhan, and diye te eglunsud-lunsud de pegsimba. The duma here, inggamit dan te timpu pad of Hari Dabid, kema ke sikandin iya ka talagsulat here. Ne ka duma, and buwad nasulat napenge e ka peghari of Dabid. Ne ka sika me ulahingen and praying, impurtanti pad kuntee eggamiten te pegsimba te me Hebrews me believers. The Psalm, migpataha ke nekey ka eggeramen te person, iling te: kaaldek egpangkus te kahale, kabelu egpangkus te pegsalig and pegkalange egpangkus te peg-iman-iman.

See also the FAQs and the Glossary.

Readers’ Version

Literal Version

An-anayan Baad

(Psalm 1–41)

1  Blessed the_man which/who not walk in/on/at/with_advice wicked and_in/on/at/with_way sinners not stand and_in/on/at/with_seat mockers not sit.

2 That/for/because/then/when if in/on/at/with_law YHWH delight_his and_in/on/at/with_law_his meditates day and_night.

3 And_it_was like_tree planted on/upon streams water which/who fruit_its he/it_gave in/on/at/with_season_its and_leaf_its not wither and_all/each/any/every which/who he/it_made/did prospers.

4 Not so the_wicked that/for/because/then/when if like_the_chaff which/who drives_away_they wind.

5 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so not stand wicked in/on/at/with_judgment and_sinners in/on/at/with_assembly righteous.

6 That/for/because/then/when YHWH watches_over road/way_of righteous and_way wicked perish.

↑ 2  To/for_what nations conspire and_peoples plot in_vain.

2 Take_~_stand kings earth/land and_rulers take_counsel together on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in YHWH and_against anointed_his.

3 Tear_off DOM bonds_their and_throw from_him/it cords_their.

4 Sits in/on/at/with_heavens laughs my_master/master scoffs them_them.

5 Then speak to_them in/on/at/with_anger_his and_in/on/at/with_fury_his terrifies_them.

6 And_me installed king_my on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Tsiuōn mountain holy_my.

7 Tell to/near decree YHWH he/it_had_said to_me son_my you(ms) I the_day begotten_you.

8 Ask of_me and_make nations inheritance_your and_possession_your ends earth.

9 Break_them in/on/at/with_rod iron like_vessel potters shatter_them.

10 And_now kings wise warned rulers earth.

11 Serve DOM YHWH in/on/at/with_fear and_rejoice in/on/at/with_trembling.

12 Kiss son lest angry and_perish way that/for/because/then/when kindled at_any_moment severe_anger_his blessed all/each/any/every take_refuge in_him/it.

4 YHWH morning hear my_sound/voice morning plead_~_case to/for_yourself(m) and_watch.

5 that/for/because/then/when not god delights wickedness you(ms) not dwell_with_you evil.

6 not stand boastful at_before eyes_your hate all/each/any/every do wrong.

7 destroy speak lies (a)_man bloodthirsty and_deceitful YHWH abhors.

12 and_rejoice all take_refuge in/on/at/with_you for_ever sing_for_joy and_spread_~_protection over_them and_exult in_you(ms) love name_your.

13 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) bless law-abiding/just YHWH as_a_shield favour surround_him.

11 ashamed and_dismayed very all/each/any/every enemies_my turn_back ashamed suddenly.

↑ 7  Shiggaion of_Dāvid which/who sang to/for_YHWH on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in words Kush son_of Benjamite.

2 YHWH god_my in/on/at/with_you take_refuge save_me from_all pursue_me and_deliver_me.

3 lest tear like_lion soul_my drag_~_away and_no rescue.

4 YHWH god_my if done this(f) if there_is wrong in/on/at/with_hands_my.

5 if repaid friend_my harm and_plundered_mmm foe_my without_cause.

6 pursue enemy soul_my and_overtake and_trample to_the_ground life_my and_honor_my in_the_dust lay selah.

7 rise_up_mmm YHWH in/on/at/with_anger_your lift_~_up in/on/at/with_fury enemies_my and_awake_mmm to_me judgment appointed.

8 and_assembly peoples gather_around_you and_over_it on_the_high return_mmm.

9 YHWH judges peoples vindicate_me YHWH according_to_righteousness_my and_according_to_integrity_my in_me.

10 come_to_an_end now evil wicked and_establish law-abiding/just and_test minds and_hearts Elohim law-abiding/just.

11 shield_my on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Elohim saves upright heart.

12 Elohim judge law-abiding/just and_god indignation in_all day.

13 if not repent sword_his sharpen bow_his bent and_made_~_ready_it.

14 and_to/for_him/it prepared vessels_of deadly arrows_his with_fiery making.

15 see/lo/see.

travails evil and_conceives trouble and_gives_birth_to lies.

16 pit dug and_hollowed_~_out_it and_falls in/on/at/with_hole made.

17 comes_back trouble_his in/on/at/with_head_his_own and_on skull_his_own violence_his comes_down.

18 thank YHWH according_to_righteousness_his and_sing_praise name_of YHWH most_high.

9 birds sky and_fish the_sea passes_along paths seas.

2 give_thanks YHWH in_all heart_my tell all/each/any/every wonders_your.

3 glad and_exult in/on/at/with_you sing_praise name_your most_high.

4 in/on/at/with_to_turn enemies_my back stumble and_perish because_of_presence_you.

10 and_ YHWH _is stronghold for_the_oppressed stronghold in_times trouble.

11 and_trust in_you(ms) know your(ms)_name that/for/because/then/when not forsaken seek_you YHWH.

12 sing_praises to/for_YHWH was_sitting Tsiuōn proclaim in/on/at/with_peoples deeds_his.

13 that/for/because/then/when avenges blood mmm_them male not forget cry afflicted.

14 gracious_me YHWH see affliction_my from_hate_me lift_~_up_me from_gates death.

15 so_that declare all/each/any/every praises_your in/on/at/with_gates daughter Tsiuōn rejoice in/on/at/with_salvation_your.

16 nations fallen in/on/at/with_pit they_had_acquired in/on/at/with_net that hid caught foot_their.

17 YHWH made_~_known judgment he/it_had_made in/on/at/with_work hands_their snared wicked higgaion selah.

18 return wicked to_sheol_to all/each/any/every nations forget Elohim.

19 that/for/because/then/when not to_always forgotten needy hope poor perish to_ever.

20 rise_up_mmm YHWH not ʼEnōshh prevail nations judged on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in presence_you.

21 put_mmm YHWH fear to/for_them nations know ʼEnōshh they(emph) selah.

↑ 10  Mmm_why.

YHWH stand in/on/at/with_far_off hide in_times trouble.

2 In/on/at/with_arrogance wicked hotly_pursue poor caught in/on/at/with_schemes that devised.

3 That/for/because/then/when boasts wicked on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in cravings heart_his and_greedy curses renounce YHWH.

4 Wicked in_pride countenance_his not seek not Elohim all/each/any/every thoughts_his.

5 Prosper ways_his in_all times high judgments_your from_near_him all/each/any/every enemies_his scoffs in/on/at/with_them.

6 He/it_had_said in/on/at/with_heart_his not moved throughout_generation and_generation which/who not in/on/at/with_adversity.

7 Cursing mouth_his filled_with and_deceit and_oppression below/instead_of tongue_his trouble and_evil.

8 Sits in/on/at/with_ambush villages in/on/at/with_hiding_places kills innocent eyes_his for_helpless stealthily_watch.

9 Lurks in/on/at/with_secret like_lion in/on/at/with_thicket_his lurks to_seize poor seizes poor in/on/at/with_draws_him in/on/at/with_net_his.

10 And_mmm crouch and_fall in/on/at/with_might_his helpless.

11 He/it_had_said in/on/at/with_heart_his god forgotten hidden his/its_faces/face never see to_ever.

12 Rise_up_mmm YHWH god lift_up hand_your not forget afflicted.

13 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in what.

renounce wicked Elohim he/it_had_said in/on/at/with_heart_his not call_~_toaccount.

14 Seen that/for/because/then/when you(ms) trouble and_grief note to_take in/on/at/with_hand_your to_you helpless commits orphan you(ms) been helper.

15 Break arm wicked and_bad/evil seek_out wickedness_his none find.

16 YHWH king forever and_ever nations perish from_land_his.

17 Desire afflicted you(ms)_paid_attention YHWH strengthen heart_their incline ear_your.

18 To_do_justice fatherless and_oppressed no he_may_repeat again/more so_that_terrify ʼEnōshh from/more_than the_earth/land.

↑ 11  For_the_director of_Dāvid in/on/at/with_LORD take_refuge how say to_soul_my flee mountain_your bird.

2 That/for/because/then/when see/lo/see.

the_wicked bend_mmm bow fitted arrow_their on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in string to_shoot from shadows at_upright heart.

3 That/for/because/then/when the_foundations destroyed_mmm law-abiding/just what.

do.

4 YHWH in_(the)_palace holy_his YHWH in/on/at/with_heaven throne_his eyes_his see eyelids_his test sons_of humankind.

5 YHWH law-abiding/just tests and_wicked and_lover violence/cruelty hates soul_his.

6 Rain on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in wicked coals fire and_sulfur and_spirit scorching portion cup_their.

7 That/for/because/then/when law-abiding/just YHWH righteous_deeds he/it_loved upright see face_his.

12:1 The pegpangananey te God

The ulahingen of Dabid for te pangulu te mangngulahing.[fn]

...

↑ 12  For_the_director on/upon the_sheminith psalm of_Dāvid.

2 help_mmm YHWH that/for/because/then/when no_longer godly that/for/because/then/when vanished faithful from_(the)_sons humankind.

3 lies speak (a)_man DOM his/its_neighbour language_of flattering in/on/at/with_heart and_heart speak.

4 YHWH cut_off all/each/any/every lips flattering tongue she/it_was_speaking great.

5 which/who say with_tongues_our prevail lips_our on_our_own who.

master to/for_us.

6 because_of_oppression afflicted because_of_groaning needy now rise_up YHWH says I_will_put/place in/on/at/with_safety longs to_him/it.

7 words YHWH words pure silver refined in/on/at/with_furnace on_the_ground purified seven_times.

8 you(ms) YHWH protect_them protect_us from/more_than the_generation this to_forever.

9 on_every_side wicked prowl_mmm when_ vileness _exalted among_children humankind.

↑ 13  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 until when.

YHWH forget_me forever until when.

hide DOM face_your from_me.

3 until when.

I_will_put/place counsel in/on/at/with_soul_my sorrow in/on/at/with_heart_my every_day until when.

exalted enemy_my over_me.

4 consider_mmm answer_me YHWH god_my give_light_mmm eyes_my lest sleep the_death.

5 lest say enemy_my overcome_him foes_my rejoice that/for/because/then/when shaken.

6 and_I in/on/at/with_steadfast_love_your trusted rejoice heart_my in/on/at/with_salvation_your sing to/for_YHWH that/for/because/then/when dealt_bountifully with_me.

↑ 14  For_the_director of_Dāvid he/it_had_said fool in/on/at/with_heart_his not Elohim corrupt do_abominable deeds not does good.

2 YHWH from_heaven looks_down on/upon sons_of humankind to_see if_there_are understand seek_after DOM Elohim.

3 The_all turned_aside together corrupt not does good not also/yet one(ms).

4 .

_never know all/each/any/every do evil eat_up people_my eat food/grain/bread YHWH not call_on.

↑ 15  Psalm of_Dāvid YHWH who.

dwell in/on/at/with_tent_your who.

2 Walks entire/complete/moral and_does what_is_right and_speaks truth in/on/at/with_heart_his.

3 Not slander on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in tongue_his not he/it_had_made to_neighbor_his evil and_reproach not takes_up on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in friend_his.

↑ 16  Miktam of_Dāvid protect_me god that/for/because/then/when take_refuge in/on/at/with_you.

2 Said to/for_YHWH my_master/master you(ms) good_I no apart_from_you.

3 As_for_saints which/who on_the_earth they(emph) and_noble all/each/any/every delight_my in/on/at/with_whom.

4 Multiply sorrows_those next/another run_after not pour_out drink_offerings_their of_blood and_not take DOM names_their on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in lips_my.

5 YHWH portion portion_my and_cup_my you(ms) hold lot_my.

6 Boundary_lines they_have_fallen to_me in/on/at/with_pleasant_places also/though inheritance beautiful have_I.

7 Bless DOM YHWH which/who counsels_me also/though night instructs_me heart_my.

8 Set YHWH at_before_me always that/for/because/then/when at_right_hand_my not shaken.

9 For_so/thus/hence glad heart_my and_rejoices glory_my also/though body_my rests in_safety.

10 That/for/because/then/when not abandon soul_my to_sheol not let faithful_your to_see decay.

11 known_me path life(pl) fullness joy DOM presence_your pleasures in/on/at/with_right_hand_your eternal.

↑ 17  Prayer of_Dāvid hear_mmm YHWH just_cause attend_mmm cry_my give_ear_mmm prayer_my in/on/at/with_not lips deceitful.

2 From_before_presence_you vindication_my come eyes_your see right.

3 Tried heart_my examined night tested_me nothing find purposed not transgress mouth_my.

4 As_for_deeds humankind in/on/at/with_word lips_your I kept ways violent.

5 Held_fast steps_my in/on/at/with_paths_your not slipped feet_my.

6 I call_on_you for answer_me god incline ear_your to_me hear my_speech/discourse.

7 Wondrously_show steadfast_love_your saviour take_refuge from_rise_up in/on/at/with_right_hand_your.

8 Keep_me as_apple daughter_of eye in/on/at/with_shadow wings_your hide_me.

9 From_face/in_front_of wicked who despoil_me enemies_my in/on/at/with_life surround around_me.

10 Calloused_their close mouths_their speak in/on/at/with_arrogance.

11 Steps_our now surround_me eyes_their set to_throw on_the_earth.

12 Likeness_of_they like_lion eager to_tear and_like_young_lion was_sitting in/on/at/with_ambush.

13 Rise_up_mmm YHWH confront_mmm before_him bring_~_down_him deliver_mmm life_my from_wicked sword_your.

14 From_men hand_your YHWH from_men of_world portion_whose in/on/at/with_life and_treasure_you fill bellies_their satisfied children and_leave abundance_their to_children_their.

15 I in/on/at/with_righteousness see face_your satisfied in/on/at/with_awake likeness_your.

18:1 The ulahingen of Dabid te pegpanalu rin

(2 Sam. 22:1-51)

The ulahingen of Dabid suluhuanen te Master God for te pangulu te mangngulahing. In-ulahing din this te timpu inluwas sikandin te Master puun ki Saul, and te langun kuntere din.

↑ 18  For_the_director of_servant YHWH of_Dāvid which/who he/it_had_said to/for_YHWH DOM words the_song the_this in/on_day YHWH delivered mmm_him from_hand all/each/any/every enemies_his and_from_hand Shāʼūl.

2 and_said love_you YHWH strength_my.

3 YHWH rock_my and_fortress_my and_deliverer_my god_my rock_my take_refuge in/on/over_him/it shield_my and_horn salvation_my stronghold_my.

4 worthy_to_be_praised call YHWH and_from enemies_my saved.

5 encompassed_me cords death and_torrents destruction overwhelmed_me.

6 cords sheol entangled_me confronted_me snares death.

7 in/on/at/with_distress to_me called YHWH and_near/to god_my cried_~_forhelp heard from_temple_his my_sound/voice and_cry_my before_presence_him came in/on/at/with_ears_his.

8 and_shook and_quaked the_earth/land and_foundations mountains trembled and_quaked that/for/because/then/when it_glowed/burned to_him/it.

9 smoke went_up in/on/at/with_nostrils_his and_fire from_mouth_his you(ms)_will_eat coals blazed from_it.

10 and_bowed heavens and_came_down and_thick_darkness below/instead_of feet_his.

11 and_rode on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in cherub and_flew and_came_swiftly on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in wings wind.

12 made darkness hiding_place_his around_him canopy_his dark waters clouds sky.

13 from_brightness before_him clouds_his broke_through hailstones and_coals fire.

14 and_thundered in/on/at/with_heavens YHWH and_most_high he/it_gave voice_his hailstones and_coals fire.

15 and_shot arrows_his and_scattered_them and_lightning flashed_forth and_routed_them.

16 and_became_visible channels waters and_laid_bare foundations world at_rebuke_your YHWH at_blast breath nostrils_your.

17 he/it_will_send_out/away from_high took_me drew_~_out_me of_waters many.

18 delivered_me from_enemy_my strong and_from_hated_me that/for/because/then/when mighty too_~_for_me.

19 confronted_me in/on/at/with_day calamity_my and_he/it_was YHWH as_support to_me.

20 and_brought_~_out_me into_a_spacious_place rescued_me that/for/because/then/when delighted in/on/at/with_me.

21 rewarded_me YHWH according_to_righteousness_my according_to_cleanness hands_my repaid to_me.

22 that/for/because/then/when kept ways YHWH and_not wickedly from_god_my.

23 that/for/because/then/when all ordinances_his at_before_me and_statutes_his not put_away from_me.

24 and_was blameless with_him/it and_kept from_guilt_my.

25 and_ YHWH _repaid to_me according_to_righteousness_my according_to_cleanness hands_my in_before sight_his.

26 with loyal show_~_loyal with (a)_man entire/complete/moral show_~_blameless.

27 with pure show_~_pure and_with crooked show_~_shrewd.

28 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) people humble save and_eyes haughty bring_down.

29 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) light lamp_my YHWH god_my lights_up darkness_my.

30 that/for/because/then/when in_you(ms) run troop and_in/on/at/with_god_my leap_over wall.

31 the_god entire/complete/moral its_road/course word YHWH flawless shield he/it to_all/each/any/every the_take_refuge in/on/over_him/it.

32 that/for/because/then/when who.

God besides_mmm YHWH and_who rock except_mmm god_our.

33 the_god the_girded_~_with_me strength and_he/it_gave entire/complete/moral way_my.

34 makes feet_my like_the_deer and_on heights_my set_~_secure_me.

35 trains hands_my for_the_war and_bend bow bronze arms_my.

36 and_given to_me shield salvation_your and_right_hand_your supported_me and_humility_your made_~_great_me.

37 gave_~_awide_place steps_my under_me and_not slip ankles_my.

38 pursued enemies_my and_overtook_them and_not turn_back until consumed_they.

39 struck_~_down_them and_not able rise fell below/instead_of feet_my.

40 and_girded_me strength for_the_battle sink adversaries_my under_me.

41 and_enemies_my you(ms)_put to/for_me backs and_hated_me destroyed_them.

42 cried_for_help and_there_was_no save on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in YHWH and_not answer_them.

43 and_beat_~_fine_them like_dust on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in face/surface_of wind like_mud streets emptied_~_out_them.

44 delivered_me from_strife people made_me as_head nations people not I_know served_me.

45 as_soon_as_heard ear obey to_me sons_of foreign_land came_cringing to_me.

46 sons_of foreign_land lost_heart and_trembling from_strongholds_their.

47 he/it_lived YHWH and_blessed rock_my and_exalted god salvation_my.

48 the_god the_gave vengeance to_me and_subdues peoples under_me.

49 delivered_me from_enemies_my also/though from/more_than adversaries_my exalted_me from_man violence/cruelty delivered_me.

50 on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so give_thanks_you in/on/at/with_nations YHWH and_to_name_your sing_praises.

51 gives_great victories king_his and_shows steadfast_love to_anointed_his to_Dāvid and_to_descendants_his until forever.

↑ 19  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 the_heavens telling glory god and_work hands_his the_firmament proclaims.

3 day to_day pour_forth speech and_night to_night reveals knowledge.

4 not speech and_there_are_no words not heard voice_their.

5 in_all the_earth/land he/it_went_forth voice_their and_in/on/at/with_end world words_their for_the_sun pitched tent/house in/on/at/with_them.

6 and_he like_bridegroom going_out from_chamber_his rejoices like_strong to_run course.

7 from_end the_heavens rising_its and_circuit_its on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in end_them and_nothing hidden from_heat_its.

8 law YHWH perfect reviving soul testimony YHWH sure making_wise simple.

9 precepts YHWH right rejoicing heart commandment YHWH pure enlightening eyes.

10 fear YHWH pure enduring to_forever ordinances YHWH true righteous altogether.

11 the_desirable more_~_than_gold and_than_fine_gold much and_sweeter than_honey and_drippings honeycomb.

12 moreover servant_your warned (is)_in_them in/on/at/with_keeping_them reward great.

13 errors who.

discern from_hidden acquit_me.

14 also/yet from_willful_sins keep_back servant_your not rule in/on/at/with_me then blameless and_innocent of_transgression great.

15 be as_acceptable words mouth_my and_meditation heart_my to_your_face YHWH rock_my and_redeemer_my.

↑ 20  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 answer_you YHWH in/on_day trouble protect_you name_of god Yaakob.

3 send help_you from_sanctuary and_from_Tsiuōn sustain_you.

4 remember all/each/any/every offerings_your and_burnt_offering_your accept_mmm selah.

5 give to/for_yourself(m) as_hearts_your and_all plans_your fulfill.

6 shout_for_joy in/on/at/with_victory_your and_in/on/at/with_name god_our set_up_~_banners YHWH fulfill all/each/any/every requests_your.

7 now I_know that/for/because/then/when YHWH saves anointed_his answer_him from_heaven holy_his in/on/at/with_mighty saving right_hand_his.

8 these in/on/at/with_chariots and_these in/on/at/with_horses and_we in/on_name_of YHWH god_our boast.

9 they(emph) collapse and_fall and_we rise and_stand_firm.

10 YHWH save_mmm the_king answer_us in/on/at/with_day call_we.

↑ 21  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 YHWH in/on/at/with_strength_your king rejoices and_in/on/at/with_help_your what.

delight very.

3 desire his/its_heart you(ms)_put for_him/it and_request lips_his not withheld selah.

4 that/for/because/then/when meet_him blessings good set on_head_his crown fine_gold.

5 life(pl) asked of_you you(ms)_put for_him/it length days forever and_ever.

6 big/great glory_his in/on/at/with_help_your majesty and_splendor bestowed on/upon/above_him/it.

7 that/for/because/then/when make_him blessings for_eternity make_~_glad_him in/on/at/with_joy DOM presence_your.

8 that/for/because/then/when the_king trusts in/on/at/with_LORD and_in/on/at/with_steadfast_love most_high not shaken.

9 find_out hand_your to/from_all/each/any/every enemies_your right_hand_your find_out hate_you.

10 make_them like_furnace fiery at_time appear_your YHWH in/on/at/with_severe_anger_his swallow_~_up_them and_consume_them fire.

11 descendants_their from_earth destroy and_offspring_their from_(the)_sons humankind.

12 that/for/because/then/when plan against_you evil devise mischief not succeed.

13 that/for/because/then/when make_~_turn_them backs in/on/at/with_bowstrings_your aim on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in faces_their.

14 exalted_mmm YHWH in/on/at/with_strength_your sing and_praise power_your.

↑ 22  For_the_director on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in doe the_dawn psalm of_Dāvid.

2 god_my god_my mmm_why.

forsaken_me far from_helping_me words groaning_my.

3 god_my cry by_day and_not answer and_night and_not rest to_me.

4 and_you(ms) holy enthroned praises Yisrael.

5 in/on/at/with_you trusted fathers_our trusted and_delivered_them.

6 to_you cried and_saved in/on/at/with_you trusted and_not put_to_shame.

7 and_I worm and_not (a)_man scorned humankind and_despised people.

8 all/each/any/every see_me mock to_me open in/on/at/with_mouths shake head.

9 trusts to/towards YHWH deliver_him rescue_him that/for/because/then/when delights in/on/over_him/it.

10 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) took_me from_womb trust_me on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in breast mothers_my.

11 on_you throw from_birth from_womb mothers_my god_my you(ms).

12 not far from_me that/for/because/then/when trouble near that/for/because/then/when not help.

13 surround_me bulls many strong Bashan encircle_me.

14 open_wide against_me mouths_their lion ravening and_roaring.

15 like_the_water poured_out and_out_of_joint all/each/any/every bones_my it_became heart_my like_the_wax melted in_the_middle breast_my.

16 dried_up like_a_potsherd strength_my and_tongue_my sticks jaws_my and_in_dust death lay_me.

17 that/for/because/then/when surrounded_me dogs gang evildoers encircled_me like_the_pierced hands_my and_feet_my.

18 count all/each/any/every bones_my they(emph) stare gloat in/on/at/with_me.

19 divide garments_my to/for_them and_for clothing_my throw lots.

20 and_you(ms) YHWH not far_off help_my to_help_me come_quickly_mmm.

21 deliver_mmm from_sword life_my from_power dogs precious_life_my.

22 save_me from_mouth lion and_from_horns wild_oxen answer_me.

23 tell name_your to_brothers_my in_the_middle congregation praise_you.

24 fear YHWH praise_him all/each/any/every seed/offspring Yaakob glorify_him and_stand_in_awe from_him/it all/each/any/every seed/offspring Yisrael.

25 that/for/because/then/when not despised and_not abhorred affliction afflicted and_not hidden his/its_faces/face from_him/it and_in/on/at/with_cried_~_forhelp_he to_him/it heard.

26 from_with_you praise_my in/on/at/with_assembly great vows_my pay before fear_him.

27 eat afflicted and_satisfied praise YHWH seek_him live hearts_your to_forever.

28 remember and_turn to/towards YHWH all/each/any/every ends earth and_worship to_your_face all/each/any/every clans_of nations.

29 that/for/because/then/when to/for_YHWH the_royalty and_rules in/on/at/with_nations.

30 eat and_worship all/each/any/every prosperous earth/land before_mmm_him kneel all/each/any/every go_down dust and_soul_his not keep_~_alive.

31 seed/offspring serve_him told about_master_mmm to_the_generation.

32 they_went and_proclaim righteousness_his to_people born that/for/because/then/when he/it_had_made.

4 Also/yet that/for/because/then/when walk in/on/at/with_valley shadow_of_death not fear evil that/for/because/then/when you(ms) with_me rod_your and_staff_your they(emph) comfort_me.

it_will_ascend in/on/at/with_hill YHWH and_who stand in/on/at/with_place holy_his.

↑ 25  Of_Dāvid to_you YHWH soul_my lift_up.

2 god_my in/on/at/with_you trust not put_to_shame not exult enemies_my to_me.

3 Also/yet all/each/any/every wait_for_you not put_to_shame ashamed the_treacherous without_cause.

4 ways_your YHWH know_me paths_your teach_me.

5 Lead_me in/on/at/with_truth_your and_teach_me that/for/because/then/when you(ms) god salvation_my mmm_you wait all/each/any/every the_day.

6 Remember compassion_your YHWH and_steadfast_love_your that/for/because/then/when from_long_ago/eternity they(emph).

7 Sins youth_my and_transgressions_my not remember according_to_steadfast_love_your remember to_me you(ms) for_~_sake goodness_your YHWH.

8 Good and_upright YHWH on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so instructs sinners in/on/at/with_way.

9 Leads humble in/on/at/with_what_is_right and_teaches humble its_road/course.

10 All/each/any/every paths YHWH steadfast_love and_faithfulness for_keep covenant_his and_decrees_his.

11 For_the_sake_of name_your YHWH and_forgive to_iniquity_my that/for/because/then/when great//chief/captain he/it.

12 Who.

this the_man fears YHWH instruct_him in/on/at/with_way choose.

13 Soul_his in/on/at/with_prosperity abide and_descendants_his inherit land.

14 Friendship YHWH for_fear_him and_covenant_his to_known_them.

15 Eyes_my ever to/towards YHWH that/for/because/then/when he/it pluck_~_out of_net feet_my.

16 Turn to_me and_gracious_me that/for/because/then/when lonely and_afflicted I.

17 Troubles heart_my enlarged of_distresses_my bring_~_out_me.

18 Consider affliction_my and_trouble_my and_forgive to/from_all/each/any/every sins_my.

19 Consider enemies_my that/for/because/then/when many and_hatred violence/cruelty hate_me.

20 Guard_mmm life_my and_deliver_me not put_to_shame that/for/because/then/when take_refuge in/on/at/with_you.

21 Integrity and_uprightness preserve_me that/for/because/then/when wait_for_you.

22 Redeem Elohim DOM Yisrael from_all troubles_its.

7 To_proclaiming in/on/at/with_voice thanksgiving and_to_telling all/each/any/every wondrous_deeds_your.

12 Foot_my stands in/on/at/with_level_ground in/on/at/with_assemblies bless YHWH.

↑ 27  Of_Dāvid YHWH light_my and_salvation_my of_whom fear YHWH stronghold life_my of_whom afraid.

3 If encamp against_me army not fear heart_my if arise against_me war in/on/at/with_this I confident.

4 one(fs) asked from_with YHWH mmm_it seek dwell_I in_house_of YHWH all/each/any/every days_of life_my to_see in/on/at/with_beauty YHWH and_to_inquire in/on/at/with_temple_his.

5 That/for/because/then/when hide_me in/on/at/with_shelter_his in/on_day trouble hide_me in/on/at/with_cover tent_his in/on/at/with_rock set_~_high_me.

6 And_now lifted_up my_head on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in enemies_my around_me and_offer in/on/at/with_tent_his sacrifices shouts_of_joy sing and_make_music to/for_YHWH.

7 Hear YHWH my_sound/voice call and_gracious_me and_answer_me.

8 To/for_yourself(m) he/it_had_said heart_my seek face_my DOM face_your YHWH seek.

9 Not hide face_your from_me not turn_~_away in/on/at/with_anger servant_your help_my been not abandon_me and_not forsake_me god salvation_my.

10 That/for/because/then/when father_my and_mother_my forsake_me and_YHWH receive_me.

11 Teach_me YHWH way_your and_lead_me in/on/at/with_path level because_of enemies_my.

12 Not give_~_over_me in/on/at/with_desire adversaries_my that/for/because/then/when risen in/on/at/with_me witnesses false and_breathing_out violence/cruelty.

13 Surely believe to_see in/on/at/with_goodness YHWH in_land life(pl).

14 Wait to/towards YHWH strong and_take_courage heart_your and_wait to/towards YHWH.

↑ 31  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 in/on/at/with_you YHWH taken_refuge not put_to_shame to_forever in/on/at/with_righteousness_your deliver_me.

3 incline to_me ear_your quickly rescue_me be to_me as_rock refuge as_mountain fortress to_save_me.

4 that/for/because/then/when rock_my and_fortress_my you(ms) and_for_~_sake names_your lead_me and_guide_me.

5 free_me of_net that secretly_set to_me that/for/because/then/when you(ms) refuge_my.

6 in/on/at/with_hand_your commit my_breath/wind/spirit redeemed mmm_me YHWH god truth.

7 hate the_pay_regard idols worthless and_I to/towards YHWH trust.

8 rejoice and_rejoice in/on/at/with_steadfast_love_your which/who seen DOM affliction_my know in/on/at/with_troubles soul_my.

9 and_not delivered_me in/on/at/with_hand enemy set in/on/at/with_broad_place feet_my.

10 gracious_me YHWH that/for/because/then/when in_distress to_me wastes_away in/on/at/with_grief eye_my soul_my and_body_my.

11 that/for/because/then/when spent in/on/at/with_sorrow life_my and_years_my in/on/at/with_sighing fails in/on/at/with_iniquity_my strength_my and_bones_my waste_away.

12 from_all adversaries_my am reproach and_to_neighbors_my very and_dread to_acquaintances_my see_me in/on/at/with_street flee from_me.

13 forgotten like_dead out_of_mind become like_vessel broken.

14 that/for/because/then/when I_heard slander many terror on_every_side in/on/at/with_scheme_they together against_me to_take/accept/receive life_my plot.

15 and_I in_you trust YHWH say god_my you(ms).

16 in/on/at/with_hand_your times_my deliver_me from_hand enemies_my and_from_persecutors_me.

17 shine_mmm face_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in servant_your save_me in/on/at/with_steadfast_love_your.

18 YHWH not put_to_shame that/for/because/then/when call_on_you put_to_shame wicked go_dumbfounded in_sheol.

19 mute lips lying the_speak on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in law-abiding/just arrogantly in/on/at/with_pride and_contempt.

20 what great goodness_your which/who stored_up for_fear_you accomplished for_those_take_refuge on/over_you(fs) in_the_sight_of sons_of humankind.

21 hide_them in/on/at/with_protection presence_your from_plots (a)_man hold_~_safe_them in/on/at/with_shelter from_strife tongues.

22 YHWH blessed that/for/because/then/when wondrously_shown steadfast_love_his to_me in/on/at/with_city besieged.

23 and_I said in/on/at/with_alarm_my cut_off from_before sight_your but you(ms)_paid_attention sound/voice supplications_my in/on/at/with_cried_~_forhelp_I to_you.

24 love DOM YHWH all/each/any/every saints_his faithful YHWH preserves and_repays on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in full acts proud.

25 strong and_take_courage heart_your all/each/any/every the_wait to/for_YHWH.

↑ 32  Of_Dāvid maskil blessed forgiven transgression covered sin.

2 Blessed humankind not YHWH impute to_him/it iniquity and_no in/on/at/with_spirit_whose deceit.

3 that/for/because/then/when kept_silent wasted_away bones_my in/on/at/with_groaning_my all/each/any/every the_day.

4 That/for/because/then/when day and_night heavy upon_me hand_your dried_up strength_my in/on/at/with_heat summer selah.

5 Sin_my acknowledged_you and_iniquity_my not hide said confess concerning transgressions_my to/for_YHWH and_you(ms) forgave guilt sin_my selah.

6 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in this(f) pray all/each/any/every faithful to_you at_time found only in_rush waters great to_him/it not reach.

7 You(ms) hiding_place to_me from_trouble preserve_me songs deliverance surround_me selah.

8 Instruct_you and_teach_you in/on/at/with_way that you(ms)_will_walk counsel upon_you eye_my.

9 Not be like_horse like_mule not understanding in/on/at/with_bit and_bridle tackle_whose for_controlled not come_near to_you.

10 Many pains of_the_wicked and_the_trusts in/on/at/with_LORD steadfast_love surrounds_him.

11 Glad in/on/at/with_LORD and_rejoice righteous and_shout_for_joy all/each/any/every upright heart.

↑ 33  Rejoice righteous in/on/at/with_LORD for_the_upright befits praise.

2 Praise to/for_YHWH in/on/at/with_lyre in/on/at/with_harp ten_strings make_music to_him/it.

3 Sing to_him/it song new skillfully play in/on/at/with_loud_shouts.

4 That/for/because/then/when upright word/matter_of YHWH and_all work_his in/on/at/with_faithfulness.

5 Loves righteousness and_justice unfailing_love YHWH the_earth/land she/it_is_full.

6 In/on/at/with_word YHWH heavens made and_in/on/at/with_breath mouth_his all/each/any/every their_group/army/objects.

7 Gathers as_a_heap waters the_sea puts in/on/at/with_storehouses deeps.

8 Fear of_LORD all/each/any/every the_earth/land from_him/it stand_in_awe all/each/any/every inhabitants world.

9 That/for/because/then/when he/it he/it_had_said and_came_to_be he/it commanded and_stood_firm.

10 YHWH brings_~_tonothing counsel nations frustrates plans peoples.

11 Counsel YHWH to_forever stands plans his/its_heart to_generation and_generation.

12 Blessed the_nation which/who YHWH his/its_god the_people chosen for_inheritance to_him/it.

13 From_heaven YHWH looks_down sees DOM all/each/any/every sons_of the_humankind.

14 From_place dwelling_his gazes to/towards all/each/any/every inhabitants the_earth/land.

15 The_fashions all hearts_them the_considers to/towards all/each/any/every works_their.

16 Not the_king saved in/on/at/with_great army mighty not delivered in/on/at/with_great ability.

17 False_hope the_horse for_victory and_in/on/at/with_great power_its not save.

18 Behold/lo/see.

eye YHWH to/towards fear_him on_those_hope in_steadfast_love_his.

19 To_deliver from_death soul_their and_to_keep_~_alive_them in/on/at/with_famine.

20 Soul_our waits to/for_YHWH help_our and_shield_our he/it.

21 That/for/because/then/when in_him/it rejoice heart_our that/for/because/then/when in/on/at/with_name holy_his trust.

22 Let_it_be steadfast_love_your YHWH upon_us just_as hope to/for_you(fs).

34:1 The pegsaye te keupiya te God

The ulahingen of Dabid te migpabubuneg sikandin diye te tangkaan of Abimilik, eyew egdeldelen sikandin of Abimilik, and egpakaawe e sikandin.

↑ 34  Of_Dāvid in/on/at/with_pretended_he DOM insane_his to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before Abimelech and_drove_~_out_him and_departed.

2 bless DOM YHWH in_all times continually praise_his in/on/at/with_mouth_my.

3 in/on/at/with_LORD boast soul_my they_will_understand humble and_glad.

4 magnify to/for_YHWH with_me and_exalt his/its_name together.

5 sought DOM YHWH and_answered_me and_from_all fears_my delivered_me.

6 look to_him/it and_radiant and_faces_their not ashamed.

7 this poor he/it_called and_LORD heard and_from_all troubles_his saved_him.

8 encamps angel YHWH around about_fear_him and_rescues_them.

9 taste and_see that/for/because/then/when good YHWH blessed the_man takes_refuge in/on/over_him/it.

10 fear DOM YHWH saints_his that/for/because/then/when not lack for_fear_him.

11 young_lions lack and_suffer_hunger and_seek YHWH not lack all good.

12 come children listen to_me fear YHWH teach_you.

13 who.

the_man the_desires life(pl) loves days to_see good.

14 keep tongue_your from_evil and_lips_your from_speaking deceit.

15 turn from_evil and_do good seek peace and_pursue_it.

16 both_eyes_of YHWH to/towards righteous and_ears_his to/towards cry_their.

17 face/surface_of YHWH in/on/at/with_do evil to_cut_off from_earth memory_them.

18 cry_out and_LORD hears and_from_all troubles_their delivers_them.

19 near YHWH to_ones_being_broken_of heart and_DOM crushed spirit saves.

20 many afflictions law-abiding/just and_from_all_them delivers_him YHWH.

21 he/it_was_watching all/each/any/every bones_his one(fs) of_them not broken.

22 slay wicked evil and_hate law-abiding/just condemned.

23 YHWH redeems creature servants_his and_not condemned all/each/any/every the_take_refuge in/on/over_him/it.

↑ 35  Of_Dāvid contend_mmm YHWH DOM who_contend_me fight DOM fight_me.

2 Take_hold shield and_buckler and_rise_up_mmm in/on/at/with_aid_my.

3 And_draw spear and_javelin to_meet pursue_me say to_soul_my salvation_your I.

4 Put_to_shame and_humiliated seek life_my may_they_be_turned back and_ashamed devise evil_me.

5 Be like_chaff to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before wind and_angel YHWH driving_~_away.

6 Let_it_be way_their dark and_slippery and_angel YHWH pursuing_them.

7 That/for/because/then/when without_cause hid to_me pit net_their without_cause dug for_life_my.

8 Come_him ruin not know and_net_his which/who hid ensnare_him in/on/at/with_ruin fall in/on/at/with_it.

9 And_soul_my rejoice in/on/at/with_LORD delight in/on/at/with_salvation_his.

10 All/each/any/every bones_my say YHWH who.

like_you delivers poor from_strong from_him/it and_poor and_needy from_robs_him.

11 Rise_up_mmm witnesses violence/cruelty which/who not I_know ask_me.

12 Repay_me evil below/instead_of good forlorn to_soul_my.

13 And_me in/on/at/with_sick_they clothing_my sackcloth humbled in/on/at/with_fasting soul_my and_prayer_my on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in bosom_my returned.

14 As_though_friend as_brother to_me went_about as_laments mother_of mourning bowed_down.

15 And_in/on/at/with_stumbling_my in_glee and_gathered gathered against_me smiters and_not I_know tore and_not ceasing.

16 In/on/at/with_ungodly mocked feast gnashed at_me teeth_their.

17 My_master/master until_when.

look_on rescue_mmm life_my from_ravages_their from_lions precious_life_my.

18 Give_~_thanks_you in/on/at/with_assembly great in/on/at/with_people mighty praise_you.

19 Not rejoice to_me enemies_my who_are_wrongfully hate_me without_cause wink eye.

20 That/for/because/then/when not peace speak and_against quiet earth/land words deceitful devise_mmm.

21 And_open_wide against_me mouths_their say aha aha seen eyes_our.

22 Seen YHWH not silent my_master/master not far from_me.

23 Wake_up_mmm and_rise_mmm to_defense_my god_my and_master_my for_cause_my.

24 Vindicate_me according_to_righteousness_your YHWH god_my and_not rejoice to_me.

25 Not say in/on/at/with_hearts_their aha desire_our not say swallowed_~_up_him.

26 Put_to_shame and_confusion altogether rejoice misfortune_my clothed shame and_dishonor the_exalt over_me.

27 Shout_for_joy and_glad delight vindication_my and_say continually great YHWH the_who_delights welfare servant_his.

28 And_tongue_my proclaim righteousness_your all/each/any/every the_day praise_your.

↑ 36  For_the_director of_servant YHWH of_Dāvid.

4 words mouth_his wickedness and_deceit ceased to_make_wise/intelligent to_do_good.

precious steadfast_love_your Elohim and_the_sons humankind in/on/at/with_shadow wings_your take_refuge_mmm.

11 continue steadfast_love_your to_know_you and_righteousness_your to_upright heart.

12 not come_me foot arrogant and_hand wicked not drive_~_away_me.

↑ 37  Of_Dāvid not fret in/on/at/with_evildoers not envious in/on/at/with_do wrong.

2 That/for/because/then/when like_the_grass quickly wither and_like_green vegetation wither_mmm.

3 Trust in/on/at/with_LORD and_do good dwell earth/land and_feed faithfulness.

4 And_delight on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in YHWH and_give to/for_yourself(m) desires heart_your.

5 Commit on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in YHWH way_your and_trust on/upon/above_him/it and_he act.

6 And_bring_forth like_the_light righteousness_your and_justice_your like_the_noonday.

7 Still to/for_YHWH and_wait_patiently to_him/it not fret in/on/at/with_prospers its_road/course in/on/at/with_man producing wicked_schemes.

8 Refrain from_anger and_forsake severe_anger not fret only to_evil.

9 That/for/because/then/when evildoers cut_off_mmm and_wait_for YHWH they(emph) inherit land.

10 And_while a_little and_no_more wicked and_look_carefully on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in place_his and_not_he.

11 And_meek inherit land and_delight on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in abundant prosperity.

12 Plot wicked against_the_righteous and_gnashes on/upon/above_him/it teeth_his.

13 My_master/master laughs to_him/it that/for/because/then/when sees that/for/because/then/when coming day_his.

14 Sword drawn wicked and_bend bow_their to_bring_down poor and_needy to_slay upright way.

15 Sword_their enter in/on/at/with_heart_their_own and_bows_their broken.

16 Good little has_the_righteous than_abundance wicked many.

17 That/for/because/then/when arms wicked broken and_upholds righteous YHWH.

18 YHWH Knows days_of blameless and_inheritance_their to_forever be.

19 Not put_to_shame in/on/at/with_times evil and_in/on/at/with_days famine have_abundance.

20 That/for/because/then/when wicked perish and_enemies YHWH like_glory pastures vanish in/on/at/with_smoke vanish_away.

21 Borrows wicked and_not repay and_righteous gracious and_gives.

22 That/for/because/then/when blessed_him inherit land and_cursed_him cut_off.

23 By_LORD steps man established and_way_his delights.

24 That/for/because/then/when stumble not fall that/for/because/then/when YHWH holds his/its_hand.

25 Young been also/yet old and_not seen law-abiding/just forsaken and_children_his begging bread.

26 All/each/any/every the_day gracious and_lending and_children_his for_blessing.

27 Depart from_evil and_do good and_abide to_always.

28 That/for/because/then/when YHWH loves justice and_not forsake DOM faithful_his to_forever kept_safe and_children wicked cut_off.

29 righteous inherit land and_dwell to_forever in_it.

30 Mouth law-abiding/just utters wisdom and_tongue_his speaks justice.

31 Law his/its_god in/on/at/with_heart_his not slip steps_his.

32 Watches wicked for_the_righteous and_seeks to_kill_him.

33 YHWH not leave_him in/on/at/with_power_his and_not condemned_him in/on/at/with_judged_he.

34 Wait to/towards YHWH and_keep its_road/course and_exalt_you to_inherit land in/on/at/with_cut_off wicked see.

35 Seen wicked violent and_spreading like_native_tree cedar_of_lebanon.

36 And_he/it_passed_through and_see/lo/see.

no_more_he and_sought_him and_not he/it_was_found.

37 Mark blameless and_observe upright that/for/because/then/when future for_man peace.

38 And_transgressors destroyed altogether future wicked cut_off.

39 And_salvation righteous from_LORD refuge_their in/on/at/with_time trouble.

40 And_helps_them YHWH and_delivers_them delivers_them from_wicked and_saves_them that/for/because/then/when take_refuge in_him/it.

↑ 38  Psalm of_Dāvid for_memorial_offering.

2 YHWH not in/on/at/with_anger_your rebuke_me and_in/on/at/with_severe_anger_your discipline_me.

3 that/for/because/then/when arrows_your sunk in/on/at/with_me and_pressed_down on_me hand_your.

4 not soundness in/on/at/with_flesh_my from_face/in_front_of indignation_your not health in/on/at/with_bones_my from_face/in_front_of sin_my.

5 that/for/because/then/when iniquities_my gone_over my_head like_burden heavy weigh too_~_for_me.

6 grow_foul fester wounds_my from_face/in_front_of foolishness_my.

7 bowed_down bowed_down until very all/each/any/every the_day mourning go_about.

8 that/for/because/then/when loins_my filled_with burning and_there_is_no soundness in/on/at/with_flesh_my.

9 feeble and_crushed until very groan because_of_anguish heart_my.

10 my_master/master before_you all longing_my and_sighing_my from_you not hidden.

11 heart_my throbs fails_me strength_my and_light eyes_my also/yet they not from_me.

12 companions_my and_friends_my from_before affliction_my stand and_relatives_my at_distance stand.

13 and_lay_snares seek life_my and_seek harm_me speak ruin and_treachery all/each/any/every the_day plot.

14 and_I like_deaf not hear and_like_mute not open mouth_his.

15 and_am like_man which/who not hear and_no in/on/at/with_mouth_whose arguments.

16 that/for/because/then/when to/for_yourself(m) YHWH wait you(ms) answer my_master/master god_my.

17 that/for/because/then/when said lest rejoice to_me in/on/at/with_slips foot_my against_me boast.

18 that/for/because/then/when I to_fall ready and_pain_my with_me ever.

19 that/for/because/then/when my_perversity/evil/guilt/punishment confess sorry because_of_sin_my.

20 and_enemies_my life(pl) mighty and_many hate_me wrongfully.

21 and_repay evil below/instead_of good accuse_me below/instead_of follow_I good.

22 not forsake_me YHWH god_my not far from_me.

23 make_haste_mmm to_help_me my_master/master salvation_my.

↑ 39  For_the_director for_Jeduthun psalm of_Dāvid.

2 said guard ways_my that_~_not_sin in/on/at/with_tongue_my guard on_mouth_my muzzle in/on/at/with_long_as wicked in_presence_my.

3 mute still held_~_tono_avail from_good and_pain_my grew_worse.

4 hot heart_my in/on/at/with_inside_of_me in/on/at/with_mused_I fire burned spoke in/on/at/with_tongue_my.

5 know_me YHWH end_my and_measure days_my what.

she/it know what.

fleeting I.

6 see/lo/see.

handbreadths you(ms)_put days_my and_lifetime_my as_nothing in_~_sight_you surely all/each/any/every Hevel/(Abel) all/each/any/every humankind stands selah.

7 surely in_(the)_image (a)_man goes_about surely Hevel/(Abel) in_turmoil_mmm heaps_up_wealth and_not know who.

gather_them.

8 and_now what.

wait_for my_master/master hope_my to/for_yourself(m) she/it.

9 from_all transgressions_my deliver_me scorn fool not make_me.

10 silent not open mouth_my that/for/because/then/when you(ms) you(ms)_have_done/made.

11 remove from_upon_me stroke_your by_opposition hand_your I worn_down.

12 in/on/at/with_punishment on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sin discipline (a)_man and_consume like_a_moth dear_him surely Hevel/(Abel) all/each/any/every humankind selah.

13 hear_mmm prayer_my YHWH and_cry_for_help_my listen_mmm to/near tears_my not deaf that/for/because/then/when alien I with_you alien like_all fathers_my.

14 turn_~_gazeaway from_me and_smile in/on/at/with_before depart and_no_more_I.

↑ 40  For_the_director of_Dāvid psalm.

2 to_wait_for I_waited_for YHWH and_inclined to_me and_he/it_listened cry_my.

3 and_brought_~_up_me from_pit destruction out_of_clay the_miry and_set on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in rock feet_my secure steps_my.

4 and_he/it_gave in/on/at/with_mouth_my song new song_of_praise to_god_our see many and_fear and_trust in/on/at/with_LORD.

5 blessed the_man which/who makes YHWH trust_his and_not turn to/towards proud and_go_astray_after false_gods.

6 many you(ms)_have_done/made you(ms) YHWH god_my wonders_your and_thoughts_your toward_us not compare with_you proclaim and_tell numerous too_~_to_count.

7 sacrifice and_offering not desire ears opened to/for_me burnt_offering and_sin_offering not required.

8 then said see/lo/see.

come in/on/at/with_scroll writing written of_me.

9 to_do will_your god_my delight and_law_your in_the_middle heart_my.

10 proclaim righteousness in/on/at/with_congregation great see/lo/see.

lips_my not restrained YHWH you(ms) know.

11 righteousness_your not hidden in_the_middle heart_my faithfulness_your and_salvation_your spoken not concealed steadfast_love_your and_truth_your from_congregation great.

12 you(ms) YHWH not withhold mercy_your from_me steadfast_love_your and_truth_your always preserve_me.

13 that/for/because/then/when encompassed around_me evils until not number overtaken_me iniquities_my and_not able to_see more than_hairs my_head and_heart_my fails_me.

14 pleased YHWH to_deliver_me YHWH to_help_me make_haste_mmm.

15 put_to_shame and_confusion altogether seek life_my to_take_it may_they_be_turned back and_humiliated desire hurt_my.

16 appalled on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in cause_of shame_their the_say to_me aha aha.

17 rejoice and_glad in/on/at/with_you all/each/any/every seek_you say continually YHWH great love salvation_your.

18 and_I poor and_needy my_master/master think to_me help_my and_deliverer_my you(ms) god_my not delay.

Igkarangeb Baad

(Psalm 42–72)

↑ 41  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 blessed regard to/towards poor in/on_day trouble delivers_him YHWH.

3 YHWH protects_him and_keeps_~_alive_him wwww on_the_earth and_not give_~_over_him in/on/at/with_desire enemies_his.

4 YHWH sustain_him on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in bed sick all/each/any/every bed_his restore in/on/at/with_illness_his.

5 I said YHWH gracious_me heal_mmm soul_my that/for/because/then/when sinned to/for_you(fs).

6 enemies_my speak evil to_me when(q) die and_perish his/its_name.

7 and_if he/it_came to_see falsely speaks his/its_heart gathers mischief to_him/it goes_out to_the_out tells.

8 together against_me whisper all/each/any/every hate_me against_me imagine worst to_me.

9 word/matter_of vile poured_out in/on/over_him/it and_which lies not again to_rise.

10 also/yet (a)_man friend_my which/who trusted in_him/it ate bread_my lifted against_me heel/hoof//track.

11 and_you(ms) YHWH gracious_me and_raise_~_up_me and_repay to/for_them.

12 in/on/at/with_this I_know that/for/because/then/when pleased in/on/at/with_me that/for/because/then/when not shout_in_triumph enemy_my over_me.

13 and_me in/on/at/with_integrity_my upheld in/on/at/with_me and_set_me to_your_face to_forever.

14 blessed YHWH god Yisrael from_the_everlasting and_unto the_everlasting amen and_amen.

↑ 42  For_the_director maskil of_sons Korah.

3 thirsts soul_my for_god for_god living_(creature) when(q) come and_appear face/surface_of Elohim.

↑ 44  For_the_director of_sons Korah maskil.

2 Elohim in/on/at/with_ears_our heard ancestors_our told to/for_us work did in/on/at/with_days_their in/on/at/with_days old.

3 you(ms) hand_your nations drove_out and_planted_them afflicted peoples and_set_free_them.

4 that/for/because/then/when not in/on/at/with_sword_their possess land and_arm_their not give_~_victory to_them that/for/because/then/when right_hand_your and_arm_your and_light face_your that/for/because/then/when delighted_in_them.

5 you(ms) he/it king_my Elohim command victories Yaakob.

6 in/on/at/with_you foes_our push_down in/on/at/with_name_your tread_down rise_up_our.

7 that/for/because/then/when not in/on/at/with_bow_my trust and_sword_my not save_me.

8 that/for/because/then/when saved_us from_foes_our and_hate_us put_to_shame.

9 in/on/at/with_god boast all the_day and_name_your to_forever give_thanks selah.

10 also/though rejected and_disgraced_us and_not gone_out in/on/at/with_armies_our.

11 turn_us back from foe and_hate_us plundered for_themselves.

12 made_us like_sheep eaten and_in/on/at/with_nations scattered_us.

13 sold people_your in/on/at/with_nothing profit and_not demanding in/on/at/with_sale_their.

14 made_us taunt to_neighbors_our derision and_scorn to_around_us.

15 made_us byword in/on/at/with_nations shaking head among peoples.

16 all/each/any/every the_day disgrace_my before_me and_shame face_my covered_me.

17 because_of_taunts taunter and_reviler from_face/in_front_of enemy and_avenger.

18 all/each/any/every this(f) happened_us and_not forgotten_you and_not false in/on/at/with_covenant_your.

19 not he_turned back heart_our and_strayed steps_our from way_your.

20 that/for/because/then/when crushed_us in/on/at/with_haunt jackals and_covered over_us in/on/at/with_deep_darkness.

21 if forgotten name_of god_our and_spread_out hands_our to_god foreign.

22 .

_not Elohim discover this(f) that/for/because/then/when he/it knowing secrets heart.

23 that/for/because/then/when for_~_sake_you killed all the_day accounted as_sheep slaughtered.

24 awake_mmm to/for_what sleep my_master/master rouse_mmm not reject to_forever.

25 to/for_what face_your hide forget affliction_our and_oppression_our.

26 that/for/because/then/when sunk_down to_the_dust soul_our cling to_the_ground bodies_our.

27 rise_up_mmm help_mmm to/for_ourselves and_redeem_us for_the_sake_of steadfast_love_your.

↑ 45  For_the_director on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in lilies of_sons Korah maskil song love.

3 handsome from_(the)_sons humankind graciousness/kindness/favour/beauty poured in/on/at/with_lips_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so blessed_you Elohim to_forever.

12 and_ the_king _desire beauty_your that/for/because/then/when he/it master_your and_bow_down to_him/it.

13 and_daughter Tsor in/on/at/with_gift favour_your seek rich people.

14 all/each/any/every glorious daughter king within with_interwoven gold clothing_her.

16 led_in in/on/at/with_joy and_gladness enter in_(the)_palace king.

17 below/instead_of fathers_your be sons_your make_them as_princes in_all the_earth/land.

18 cause_~_tobe_remembered name_your in_all generation and_generation on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in yes/correct/thus/so peoples praise_you to_vanishing_point and_ever.

↑ 49  For_the_director of_sons Korah psalm.

2 hear this(f) all/each/any/every the_peoples give_ear all/each/any/every inhabitants world.

3 also/yet sons_of humankind also/yet sons_of (a)_man together rich and_poor.

4 mouth_my speak wisdom and_meditation heart_my understanding.

5 incline to_proverb ear_my solve in/on/at/with_harp riddle_my.

6 to/for_what fear in/on/at/with_times trouble iniquity foes_my surrounds_me.

7 the_trust on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in wealth_their and_in/on/at/with_abundance riches_their boast.

8 brother not to_redeem (a)_man he_can_redeem not he/it_gave to_god ransom_his.

9 and_costly ransom life_their and_stop to_forever.

10 and_live_on again/more to_forever not he/it_will_see the_pit.

11 that/for/because/then/when he/it_will_see wise die alike fool and_senseless perish and_leave to_others wealth_their.

12 within_their houses_their to_forever dwelling_places_their to_generation and_generation called in/on/at/with_names_their_own to lands.

13 and_human/ʼĀdām in/on/at/with_pomp not endure like like_the_beasts perish.

14 this way_those foolish in_themselves_mmm and_after_them in/on/at/with_sayings_their approve selah.

15 like_the_sheep for_sheol appointed death shepherd_them and_rule in/on/at/with_them upright in_the_morning and_form_their to_ sheol _waste_away from_lofty_abode to_him/it.

16 but Elohim redeem soul_my from_power sheol that/for/because/then/when receive_me selah.

17 not afraid that/for/because/then/when (a)_man becomes_rich that/for/because/then/when increases wealth house_his.

18 that/for/because/then/when not in/on/at/with_dies_he take the_any not descend after_him wealth_his.

19 that/for/because/then/when soul_his in/on/at/with_lifetime_he count_~_happy and_praise_you that/for/because/then/when you(ms)_will_do_well/be_happy to/for_you(fs).

20 go until generation fathers_his until forever not see light.

21 humankind in/on/at/with_pomp and_not understanding like like_the_beasts perish.

↑ 50  Psalm of_ʼĀşāf Mighty_one Elohim YHWH he/it_had_said and_he/it_called earth from_rising sun until setting_its.

2 From_Tsiuōn perfection beauty Elohim shines_forth.

3 Comes god_our and_not keep_silence fire before_mmm_him you(ms)_will_eat and_around_him tempest very.

4 He/it_called/named to/towards the_heavens at_above and_near/to the_earth/land that_judge people_his.

5 Gather to_me faithful_my made covenant_me by sacrifice.

6 And_ heavens _declare righteousness_his that/for/because/then/when Elohim judge he/it selah.

7 Hear_mmm people_my and_speak Yisrael and_testify on/over_you(fs) Elohim god_your I.

8 Not on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sacrifices_your rebuke_you and_burnt_offerings_your at_before_me continually.

9 Not take from_house_your bull from_folds_your goats.

10 That/for/because/then/when to_me all animal_mmm forest cattle in/on/at/with_hills a_thousand.

11 I_know all/each/any/every bird mountains and_creatures field with_me.

12 If hungry not tell to/for_you(fs) that/for/because/then/when to_me world and_all_that_is_in_it.

13 .

_eat flesh bulls and_blood goats drink.

14 Offer to_god sacrifice_of_thanksgiving and_pay to_most_high vows_your.

15 And_call_on_me in/on_day trouble deliver_you and_honor_me.

16 And_to_the_wicked Elohim he/it_had_said what.

have_you to_recite statutes_my and_take covenant_my on lips_your.

17 And_you(ms) hate discipline and_throw words_my behind_you.

18 If see thief and_pleased with_him/it and_with adulterers company_you.

19 Mouth_your give_~_freerein in/on/at/with_evil and_tongue_your harness deceit.

20 Sit in/on/at/with_brother_your speak in/on/at/with_son mothers_your_own you_give slander.

21 These you(ms)_have_done/made and_silent thought to_be was like_you rebuke_you and_lay_the_charge before_eyes_your.

22 Consider now this(f) forget god lest tear_~_apart and_none deliver.

23 Sacrifices thank_offering honors_me and_orders road/way_of show_him in/on/at/with_salvation Elohim.

↑ 51  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 In/on/at/with_came to_him/it Nātān the_prophet after_when he/it_came to/towards daughter_of wwww.

3 have_mercy_on_me Elohim according_to_steadfast_love_your according_to_abundant compassion_your blot_out transgressions_my.

4 thoroughly wash_me from_iniquity_my and_from_sin_my cleanse_me.

5 that/for/because/then/when transgressions_my I know and_sin_my before_me ever.

6 to/for_yourself(m) by_yourself_you sinned and_the_evil in/on/at/with_sight_your done so_that justified in/on/at/with_speak_you blameless in/on/at/with_judge_you.

7 if in/on/at/with_iniquity born and_in/on/at/with_sin conceived_me mother_my.

8 if truth desire in/on/at/with_inward_being and_in/on/at/with_secret wisdom teach_me.

9 purify_me in/on/at/with_hyssop and_clean wash_me and_than_snow whiter.

10 hear_me joy and_gladness rejoice bones crushed.

11 hide face_your from_sins_my and_all iniquities_my blot_out.

12 heart clean create to_me Elohim and_spirit steadfast renew in/on/at/with_inside_of_me.

13 not throw_~_away_me from_in_presence_your and_spirit holy_your not take from_me.

14 restore_mmm to/for_me joy salvation_your and_spirit willing sustain_me.

15 teach transgressors ways_your and_sinners to_you return.

16 deliver_me from_guilt_of_bloodshed Elohim god salvation_my sing_aloud tongue_my righteousness_your.

17 my_master/master lips_my open and_mouth_my declare praise_your.

18 that/for/because/then/when not delight_in sacrifice and_give burnt_offering not pleased.

19 sacrifices Elohim spirit broken heart broken and_contrite Elohim not despise.

20 do_good_mmm in/on/at/with_good_pleasure_your DOM Tsiuōn build walls Yərūshālayim.

21 then delight sacrifices righteous burnt_offerings and_whole_burnt_offerings then offered on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in altar_your bulls.

The ulahingen[fn] of Dabid for te pangulu te mangngulahing. Insulat din this te migkahiyan of Deig Idumihanen si Saul, “Miggendiyad si Dabid ki Ahimilik.”

↑ 52  For_the_director maskil of_Dāvid.

2 In/on/at/with_came Doeg the_Edomite and_told to_Shāʼūl and_he/it_said to_him/it Dāvid he/it_came to/towards house_of Ahimelech.

3 what.

boast in/on/at/with_evil the_mighty mischief god all/each/any/every the_day.

5 love evil more_than_good lying more_than_speaking truth selah.

9 see/lo/see.

the_man not make Elohim refuge_his and_trusted in/on/at/with_abundance riches_his sought_refuge in/on/at/with_destructive_behavior_his.

60:1 The pegpangananey te God

The ulahingen[fn] of Dabid for te teaching, for te pangulu te mangngulahing. Insulat din this te migpakiggira sikandin te me matig-Aram-Naharaim and te me matig-Aram-Suba, and te nakalibed e si Huwab and nekeyimatey te 12,000 me matig-Idum diye te bangalug egngaranan te Asin. Eg-ulahingen this iling te peg-ulahing te “Liryu te Pangguhuren.”

↑ 63  Psalm of_Dāvid in/on/at/with_was_he in/on/at/with_wilderness Yehuda.

2 Elohim god_my you(ms) earnestly_~_seek_you thirsts to/for_yourself(m) soul_my faints to/for_yourself(m) flesh_my in_land_of dry and_weary no water.

3 yes/correct/thus/so in/on/at/with_sanctuary seen_you to_see power_your and_glory_your.

4 that/for/because/then/when good steadfast_love_your than_life lips_my praise_you.

5 yes/correct/thus/so bless_you in/on/at/with_live_I in/on/at/with_name_your lift_up hands_my.

6 as best and_richest satisfied soul_my and_lips joyful praise mouth_my.

7 if remember_you on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in bed_my in/on/at/with_night_watches meditate on/over_you(fs).

8 that/for/because/then/when been help_mmm to/for_me and_in/on/at/with_shadow wings_your sing_for_joy.

9 clings soul_my to_you in/on/at/with_me upholds right_hand_your.

10 and_those to_destroy seek life_my they_went in/on/at/with_depths the_earth/land.

11 given_over_him on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in power sword portion jackals become.

12 and_the_king rejoice in/on/at/with_god boast all/each/any/every the_swear in/on/over_him/it that/for/because/then/when stopped mouths speak lies.

he/it_will_see to_them.

↑ 65  For_the_director psalm of_Dāvid song.

4 deeds iniquity prevail against_me transgressions_our you(ms) forgive_them.

5 blessed choose and_bring_near live courts_your satisfied in/on/at/with_goodness house_your holy temple_your.

6 awesome in/on/at/with_righteousness answer_us god salvation_our hope all/each/any/every ends earth/land and_seas farthest.

7 established mountains in/on/at/with_strength_his girded in/on/at/with_might.

8 stills roaring seas roaring waves_their and_tumult peoples.

9 and_in_awe live ends_of_the_earth by_signs_your dawns morning and_evening shout_for_joy.

10 visit the_earth/land and_water_it greatly enrich_it Feleg Elohim full_of water provide grain_their that/for/because/then/when so prepare_it.

11 furrows_its water_~_abundantly settling ridges_its in/on/at/with_showers soften_it growth_its bless.

12 crown year_of bounty_your and_carts_your overflow_drip_with richness.

13 overflow pastures wilderness and_joy hills gird.

14 meadows clothed the_flocks and_valleys covered grain shout_in_triumph also/though sing.

↑ 66  For_the_director song psalm shout_joyfully to_god all/each/any/every the_earth/land.

3 Say to_god what.

awesome works_your in/on/at/with_great power_your cringe to/for_yourself(m) enemies_your.

4 All/each/any/every the_earth/land worship to/for_yourself(m) and_sing_praise to/for_you(fs) sing_praises name_your selah.

5 Come and_see what_~_hasdone Elohim awesome deeds on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sons_of humankind.

11 Brought_us in/on/at/with_net laid burdens in/on/at/with_backs_our.

14 Which/who uttered lips_my and_spoke mouth_my in/on/at/with_distress to_me.

15 Burnt_offerings fat_animals offer to_you with smoke rams make bulls with goats selah.

16 Come hear and_tell all/each/any/every fear Elohim which/who he/it_had_made for_soul_my.

17 To_him/it mouth_my cried_out and_extolled below/instead_of tongue_my.

18 Iniquity if cherished in/on/at/with_heart_my not listened my_master/master.

19 But Elohim listened given_heed in/on/at/with_voice prayer_my.

20 Blessed Elohim which/who not rejected prayer_my and_steadfast_love_his from_with_me.

↑ 68  For_the_director of_Dāvid psalm song.

2 Elohim arise scattered enemies_his and_flee hate_him from_presence_him.

3 as_ smoke _driven_away drive_~_away as_ wax _melts from_face/in_front_of fire perish wicked from_face/in_front_of Elohim.

4 and_righteous glad exult to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before Elohim and_rejoice in/on/at/with_joy.

5 sing to_god sing_praises his/its_name lift_up to_the_rides in/on/at/with_clouds in/on/at/with_LORD his/its_name and_rejoice before_mmm_him.

6 father_of fatherless and_judge widows Elohim in/on/at/with_habitation holy_his.

7 Elohim settles lonely home_in leads_out prisoners in/on/at/with_prosperity but rebellious live_in parched_land.

8 Elohim in/on/at/with_went_out_you to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before people_your in/on/at/with_marched_you in/on/at/with_wilderness selah.

9 earth/land quaked also/though heavens poured_down from_face/in_front_of Elohim this Şīnay from_face/in_front_of Elohim god Yisrael.

10 rain abundant shed_abroad Elohim inheritance_your and_languished you(ms) revived_it.

11 people_your settled in/on/at/with_it provided in/on/at/with_goodness_your for_the_poor Elohim.

12 my_master/master gives command the_bore_the_tidings company great.

13 kings armies/angels flee_mmm flee_mmm and_remains home divide spoil.

14 if lie_down_mmm between sheepfolds wings dove covered in/on/at/with_silver and_pinions_its in/on/at/with_glistening gold.

15 in/on/at/with_ almighty _scattered kings in/on/at/with_it snowed in/on/at/with_Zalmon.

16 mountain Elohim mountain Bashan mountain peaks mountain Bashan.

17 to/for_what look_with_envy_mmm mountain many-peaked the_mountain Elohim desired for_abode_his also/though YHWH dwell to_forever.

18 chariots Elohim ten_thousand thousands_of multitude my_master/master in/on/at/with_them Şīnay in/on/at/with_sanctuary.

19 ascended mmm_mmm wwww wwww wwww wwww in/on/at/with_mmm and_mmm wwww mmm_mmm wwww Elohim.

20 blessed my_master/master day day bears_~_burdens to/for_us the_god salvation_our selah.

21 the_god to/for_us god of_salvation and_to_GOD my_master/master from_the_death escape.

22 surely Elohim shatter head enemies_his crown hairy walking_around/wandering in/on/at/with_guilty_his.

23 he/it_had_said my_master/master from_Bashan bring_~_back bring_~_back from_depths sea.

24 so_that shatter foot_your in/on/at/with_blood tongues dogs_your from_enemies share_their.

25 seen procession_your Elohim procession god_my king_my in/on/at/with_sanctuary.

26 in_front singers after musicians in_the_middle young_women playing_tambourines.

27 in/on/at/with_great_congregation bless Elohim YHWH of_fountain Yisrael.

28 there Binəyāmīn little leading_them princes Yehuda throng_their princes Zebulun princes Naphtali.

29 summon god_your strength_your show_~_strength_mmm Elohim who done to/for_ourselves.

30 because_of_temple_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Yərūshālayim to/for_yourself(m) kings bring gifts.

31 rebuke being/animal reeds herd bulls in/on/at/with_calves peoples trample_underfoot in/on/at/with_bars silver scatter peoples war delight_in.

32 ambassadors come from Miʦərayim/(Egypt) Kush quickly_stretch_out hands_her to_god.

33 kingdoms the_earth/land sing to_god sing_praise my_master/master selah.

34 to_the_rides in/on/at/with_heavens heavens ancient if he/it_gave in/on/at/with_voice_his sound/voice mighty.

35 ascribe power to_god on/upon Yisrael majesty_his and_power_his in/on/at/with_skies.

36 Elohim awesome in_sanctuary_your god Yisrael he/it gives power and_strength to_the_people Elohim blessed.

↑ 69  For_the_director on/upon lilies of_Dāvid.

2 save_me Elohim that/for/because/then/when waters come_up until soul.

3 sink in/on/at/with_mire deep and_there_is_no foothold come in/on/at/with_deep waters and_flood sweeps_over_me.

4 weary in/on/at/with_crying_my parched throat_my fail eyes_my waiting for_god_my.

5 more_in_number more_~_than_hairs my_head hate_me without_cause many destroy_me enemies_my falsely which/who not steal then restore.

6 Elohim you(ms) know to_folly_my and_wrongs_my from_you not hidden.

7 not put_to_shame in/on/at/with_me wait_for_you my_master/master GOD armies/angels not dishonored in/on/at/with_me seek_you god Yisrael.

8 that/for/because/then/when for_~_sake_your borne reproach shame covered face_my.

9 stranger become to_brothers_my and_alien to_sons mothers_my.

10 that/for/because/then/when zeal house_your consumed_me and_insults insult_you they_have_fallen on_me.

11 and_wept in/on/at/with_fasting soul_my and_it_became of_reproach to_me.

12 and_made_mmm clothing_my sackcloth and_became to/for_them as_byword.

13 talk in/on/at/with_me sit gate and_songs ones_drinking_of strong_drink.

14 and_me prayer_my to/for_yourself(m) YHWH time acceptable Elohim in/on/at/with_abundance steadfast_love_your answer_me in/on/at/with_sure salvation_your.

15 rescue_me from_mire and_not sink delivered from_hate_me and_from_deep waters.

16 not sweep_over_me flood waters and_not swallow_~_up_me deep and_dont close over_me pit her/its_mouth.

17 answer_me YHWH that/for/because/then/when good steadfast_love_your according_to_abundant mercy_your turn to_me.

18 and_not hide face_your from_servant_your that/for/because/then/when in_distress to_me quickly answer_me.

19 draw_near_mmm to/towards soul_my redeem_it because_of enemies_my ransom_me.

20 you(ms) know reproach_I and_shame_my and_dishonor_my before_you all/each/any/every adversaries_my.

21 insults broken heart_my and_sick_mmm and_looked for_sympathy and_there_was_none and_for_THE_comforters and_not found.

22 and_gave in/on/at/with_food_my head and_for_thirst_my gave_~_todrink_me vinegar.

23 let_it_be table_their before_mmm_them as_snare and_for_peace as_trap.

24 darkened eyes_their cannot_see and_loins_their continually tremble.

25 pour_out on_them indignation_your and_fierceness_of anger_of_your overtake_them.

26 be camp_their desolation in/on/at/with_tents_their not let_it_be was_sitting.

27 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) which/who struck persecute and_near/to pain wounded_you talk.

28 add_mmm guilt on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in guilt_their and_not they_went in/on/at/with_righteousness_your.

29 blotted_out of_book life(pl) and_with righteous not recorded.

30 and_I afflicted and_in_pain salvation_your Elohim protect_me.

31 praise name_of Elohim in/on/at/with_song and_magnify_him in/on/at/with_thanksgiving.

32 and_please to/for_YHWH more_than_ox bull with_horns hoofs.

33 see humble glad seek Elohim and_revive heart_your.

34 that/for/because/then/when hears to/towards needy YHWH and_DOM prisoners_his not despise.

35 praise_him heaven and_earth seas and_all moves in/on/at/with_them.

36 that/for/because/then/when Elohim save Tsiuōn and_rebuild cities Yehuda and_dwell there and_possess_it.

37 and_children servants_his inherit_it and_love his/its_name dwell in/on/at/with_it.

↑ 71  In/on/at/with_you YHWH taken_refuge not put_to_shame to_forever.

2 In/on/at/with_righteousness_your rescue_me and_deliver_me incline to_me ear_your and_save_me.

3 Be to_me as_rock refuge to_come always give_the_command to_save_me that/for/because/then/when rock_my and_fortress_my you(ms).

4 god_my rescue_me from_hand wicked from_grasp unjust and_cruel.

5 that/for/because/then/when you(ms) hope_my my_master/master GOD confidence_my from_youth_my.

6 Upon_you leaned from_birth from_womb mothers_my you(ms) took_me in/on/at/with_you praise_my continually.

7 Like_portent become to_many and_you(ms) refuge_my strong.

8 Filled mouth_my praise_your all/each/any/every the_day glory_your.

9 Not throw_~_off_me in_time old_age when_fails strength_my not forsake_me.

10 That/for/because/then/when speak enemies_my to_me and_watch_for life_my conspire together.

11 To_say Elohim forsaken_him pursue and_seize_him that/for/because/then/when not deliver.

12 Elohim not far from_me god_my to_help_me hurry_mmm.

13 Ashamed consumed adversaries soul_my covered scorn and_disgrace seek harm_me.

14 And_I continually hope and_more_and_more on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in all/each/any/every praise_you.

15 Mouth_my tell righteousness_your all/each/any/every the_day salvation_your that/for/because/then/when not I_know number.

16 Come in/on/at/with_mighty_deeds my_master/master GOD proclaim righteousness_your by_yourself_yours.

17 Elohim taught_me from_youth_my and_unto they(f) proclaim wondrous_deeds_your.

18 And_also until old and_gray Elohim not forsake_me until proclaim power_your to_generation to/from_all/each/any/every come power_your.

19 And_righteousness_your Elohim until high_heavens which/who you(ms)_have_done/made great Elohim who.

like_you.

20 Which/who see_me troubles many and_calamities you(ms)_will_return revive_me and_from_depths the_earth/land you(ms)_will_return bring_~_up_me.

21 Increase honor_my and_once_again comfort_me.

22 Also/yet I praise_you in/on/at/with_instrument harp faithfulness_your god_my sing_praises to/for_yourself(m) in/on/at/with_lyre holy Yisrael.

23 Shout_for_joy lips_my that/for/because/then/when sing_praises to_you and_soul_my which/who redeemed.

24 Also/yet tongue_my all/each/any/every the_day talk righteousness_your that/for/because/then/when put_to_shame and humiliated seek harm_me.

20 ◘

Igkatelu Baad

(Psalm 73–89)

↑ 72  Of_Shəlomih Elohim justice_your to_king give and_righteousness_your to_son king.

2 Judge people_your in/on/at/with_righteousness and_afflicted_your in/on/at/with_justice.

3 mountains Bring prosperity to_the_people and_hills in/on/at/with_righteousness.

4 Defend afflicted people save to_children needy and_crush oppressor.

5 Fear_you with sun and_as_long_as moon generation_of generations.

6 Falls like_rain on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in mown_grass like_showers water earth.

7 Flourish in/on/at/with_days_his law-abiding/just and_abound peace until no_more moon.

8 And_rule from_sea until sea and_from_river until ends earth.

9 Before_mmm_him wilderness_tribes bow_down and_enemies_his dust lick.

10 kings Tarshish and_islands donation/offering bring kings Sheba and_Seba gifts present.

11 And_bow_down to_him/it all kings all/each/any/every nations serve_him.

12 That/for/because/then/when deliver needy cry_out and_afflicted and_no helper to_him/it.

13 Take_pity on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in weak and_needy and_lives needy save.

14 From_oppression and_from_violence redeem life_their and_precious blood_their in/on/at/with_sight_his.

15 And_live and_given to_him/it from_gold Sheba and_pray for_him continually all/each/any/every the_day bless_him.

16 Let_it_be abundance grain on_the_earth in/on/at/with_tops mountains wave like_the_Lebanon fruit_its and_flourish in_cities like_grass the_earth/land.

17 Let_it_be his/its_name to_forever to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before sun increase his/its_name and_blessed in_him/it all/each/any/every nations call_~_blessed_him.

18 Blessed YHWH Elohim god Yisrael does wondrous for_him/it_being_alone.

19 And_blessed name_of glorious_his to_forever and_filled glory_his DOM all the_earth/land amen and_amen.

20 Ended prayers Dāvid son_of Yishay.
