↑ 73  Psalm of_ʼĀşāf surely good to_Yisərāʼēl Elohim to_pure heart.

2 And_me as_almost stumbled feet_my as_nearly slipped steps_my.

3 That/for/because/then/when envied in/on/at/with_arrogant prosperity wicked saw.

4 That/for/because/then/when not pains until_death_they and_healthy bodies_their.

5 In/on/at/with_trouble ʼEnōshh not_they and_like humankind not plagued.

6 For_so/thus/hence necklace_their pride covers garment violence/cruelty them_them.

7 He/it_went_forth from_fatness eyes_their overflow imaginations hearts.

8 Mock and_speak in/on/at/with_malice oppression from_on_high threaten.

9 Set in_the_heavens mouths_their and_tongues_their range on_the_earth.

10 For_so/thus/hence turn people_his there and_waters abundance drink in_them.

11 And_say how god know and_is_there knowledge in/on/at/with_most_high.

12 Behold/lo/see.

these wicked and_at_ease always increase wealth.

13 Surely in_vain kept_~_pure heart_my and_washed in/on/at/with_innocence hands_my.

14 And_been plagued all/each/any/every the_day and_punished_I in_the_morning.

15 If said speak thus see/lo/see.

generation children_your betrayed.

16 And_thought_mmm to_know this(f) wearisome_task it in/on/at/with_eyes_me.

17 Until went to/towards sanctuary god understood about_end_their.

18 Surely in/on/at/with_slippery_places set them_them fall_them to_ruin.

19 How they_were for_destroyed in_moment swept_away utterly from/more_than terrors.

20 Like_dream when_awakes my_master/master in/on/at/with_awaking phantoms_their despise.

21 That/for/because/then/when embittered heart_my and_heart_my pricked.

22 And_I stupid and_not understand brute_beast was toward_you.

23 And_I continually with_you hold in/on/at/with_hand right_my.

24 In/on/at/with_counsel_your guide_me and_after glory receive_me.

25 Who.

to_me in/on/at/with_heaven and_besides_you not desire in/on_the_earth.

26 Fail flesh_my and_heart_my strength heart_my and_portion_my Elohim to_forever.

27 That/for/because/then/when see/lo/see.

far_from_you perish destroy all/each/any/every unfaithful to_you.

28 And_me near Elohim to_me good made in/on/at/with_master_mmm GOD refuge_my that_tell all/each/any/every works_your.

↑ 74  Maskil of_ʼĀşāf mmm_why.

Elohim rejected to_forever smoke anger_your in/on/at/with_sheep pasture_your.

2 Remember congregation_your purchased long_ago redeemed tribe inheritance_your mount Tsiuōn this dwelt in/on/over_him/it.

3 Direct_mmm steps_your to_ruins perpetual all/each/any/every destroyed enemy in/on/at/with_sanctuary.

4 Roared foes_your in/on/at/with_midst meeting_place_your set_up emblems_their signs.

5 Was like_wielding at_upper_mmm in/on/at/with_thicket tree/word axes.

6 And_then carved_work_its all in/on/at/with_hatchets and_hammers smashed_mmm.

7 Set in/on/at/with_fire sanctuary_your to_the_ground defiled dwelling_place name_your.

8 Said in/on/at/with_hearts_their subdue_them completely burned all meeting_places god on_the_earth.

9 Signs_our not see not again/more prophet and_not among_us knowing until what.

10 Until when(q) Elohim enemy revile scoff foe name_your to_forever.

11 To/for_what hold_back hand_your and_right_hand_your from_folds bosom_your destroy.

12 And_god king_my from_east working salvation in/on/at/with_midst the_earth/land.

13 You(ms) divided in/on/at/with_strength_your sea broke heads sea_monsters on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_waters.

14 You(ms) crushed heads leviathan gave_him food to_people to_creatures_of_the_wilderness.

15 You(ms) opened_up springs and_streams you(ms) dried_up rivers ever-flowing.

16 To/for_yourself(m) day also/though to/for_yourself(m) night you(ms) established moon and_sun.

17 You(ms) set all/each/any/every boundaries earth summer and_winter you(ms) made_them.

18 remember this(f) enemy mocked YHWH and_people foolish reviles name_your.

19 Not deliver to_beasts creature dove_your being/animal afflicted_your not forget to_forever.

20 Have_regard for_the_covenant that/for/because/then/when full_of dark_places earth/land haunts violence/cruelty.

21 Not turn_back oppressed in_shame poor and_needy praise name_your.

22 Rise_up_mmm Elohim plead_mmm cause_your remember scoff_you by foolish all/each/any/every the_day.

23 Not forget sound/voice adversaries_your uproar rise_your goes_up continually.

↑ 78  Maskil of_ʼĀşāf hear_mmm people_my teaching_my incline ears_your to_words mouth_my.

2 Open in/on/at/with_parable mouth_my utter dark_sayings from of_old.

3 Which/who heard and_known_them and_fathers_our told to/for_us.

4 Not hide from_children_their to_generation next tell praises YHWH and_might_his and_wonders_his which/who he/it_had_made.

5 And_established testimony in/on/at/with_Yaˊaqov and_law appointed in/on/at/with_Yisərāʼēl which/who commanded DOM fathers_our to_teach_them to_children_their.

6 That know generation next sons born arise and_tell to_children_their.

7 And_put in/on/at/with_god confidence_their and_not forget works god and_commandments_his keep.

8 And_not be like_fathers_their generation stubborn and_rebellious generation not steadfast his/its_heart and_not faithful DOM god his/its_breath/wind/spirit.

9 Sons_of Ephraim armed ones_shooting_of bows turned_back in/on_day battle.

10 Not keep covenant Elohim and_in/on/at/with_law_his refused to_walk.

11 And_forgot deeds_he and_wonders_his which/who shown_them.

12 In_the_sight_of fathers_their he/it_had_made wonders in_land Miʦərayim/(Egypt) region Zoan.

13 Divided sea and_pass_through_them and_stand waters like heap.

14 And_led_them in/on/at/with_cloud by_day and_all the_night in/on/at/with_light fiery.

15 Split rocks in/on/at/with_wilderness and_gave_~_drink as_depths enough/great(fs).

16 And_brought_~_out streams of_rock and_flow_down like_the_rivers water.

17 And_more again/more to_sin to_him/it by_rebelling most_high in/on/at/with_wilderness.

18 And_tested god in/on/at/with_heart_their by_demanding food for_craved_they.

19 And_they_spoke in/on/at/with_god saying .

_ god _can to_spread table in/on/at/with_wilderness.

20 If struck rock and_ waters _gushed_out and_streams overflowed .

_also food/grain/bread he/it_would_be_able to_give if provide meat for_people_his.

21 For_so/thus/hence YHWH heard and_very_angry and_fire kindled in/on/at/with_Yaˊaqov and_also also/though mounted in/on/at/with_Yisərāʼēl.

22 That/for/because/then/when not believe in/on/at/with_god and_not trust in/on/at/with_salvation_his.

23 And_he/it_commanded skies at_above and_doors heaven opened.

24 And_rained_down on_them manna to_eat and_grain heaven he/it_gave them_them.

25 Food/grain/bread angels (a)_man ate food Shalah to/for_them in_abundance.

26 Caused_~_toblow east_wind in/on/at/with_heavens and_drove in/on/at/with_power_his south_wind.

27 And_rained on_them like_the_dust meat and_like_sand seas bird wing/corner/skirt.

28 And_he/it_made_fall/lie_down in/on/at/with_midst camp_their all_around about_dwellings_their.

29 And_ate and_filled very and_what_~_craved_they gave to/for_them.

30 Not turned_aside from_craving_their again/more food_their in/on/at/with_mouths_their.

31 And_anger Elohim rose in/among_them and_killed in/on/at/with_strongest_them and_young_men Yisrael laid_low.

32 In_all this(f) sinned again/more and_not believe in/on/at/with_wonders_his.

33 And_they_were_ended/finished in/on/at/with_futility days_their and_years_their in/on/at/with_terror.

34 If killed_them and_sought_him and_repented and_sought_~_earnestly god.

35 And_remembered that/for/because/then/when Elohim rock_their and_god most_high redeemer_their.

36 And_deceived_him in/on/at/with_mouths_their and_in/on/at/with_tongues_their lied to_him/it.

37 And_heart_their not steadfast with_him/it and_not faithful in/on/at/with_covenant_his.

38 And_he compassionate forgave iniquity and_not destroy and_often to_restrained anger_his and_not stir_up all/each/any/every severe_anger_his.

39 And_remembered that/for/because/then/when flesh/meat they(emph) wind passes and_not return.

40 As_the_how.

rebelled_against_him in/on/at/with_wilderness grieved_him in/on/at/with_wilderness.

41 And_again_and_again and_tested god and_holy Yisrael provoked.

42 not remember DOM his/its_hand day which/who redeemed_them from foe.

43 Which/who performed in/on/at/with_Miʦərayim/(Egypt) signs_his and_wonders_his in/on/at/with_region Zoan.

44 And_turned to_blood rivers_their and_streams_their not drink_mmm.

45 Sent (is)_in_them swarms_of_flies and_devoured_them and_frogs and_destroyed_them.

46 And_he/it_gave to_the_caterpillar crops_their and_fruit_of_~_labor_their to_the_locust.

47 Destroyed in/on/at/with_hail vines_their and_sycamore_trees_their in/on/at/with_frost.

48 And_gave_over to_the_hail cattle_their and_livestock_their to_the_lightning_bolts.

49 Sent in/on/at/with_them hot anger_his severe_anger and_indignation and_trouble band angels destroying.

50 Cleared path for_anger_his not spare from_death soul_their and_lives_their to_the_plague gave_~_over.

51 And_struck_down all/each/any/every firstborn in/on/at/with_Miʦərayim beginning_of virility in/on/at/with_tents Ham.

52 And_led_out like_the_sheep people_his and_guided_them like_a_flock in/on/at/with_wilderness.

53 And_led_them in_safety and_not afraid and_DOM enemies_their the_sea covered.

54 And_he/it_brought_them to/towards border holy_his mountain this acquired right_hand_his.

55 And_he/it_drove_out from_their_face/front nations and_apportioned_them in/on/at/with_lot inheritance and_he/it_made_stay/reside in/on/at/with_tents_their tribes Yisrael.

56 And_tested and_rebelled_against DOM Elohim most_high and_decrees_his not keep.

57 And_turned_away and_faithless like_fathers_their twisted like_bow faulty.

58 And_provoked_~_toanger_him in/on/at/with_high_places_their and_in/on/at/with_idols_their aroused_~_jealousy_his.

59 Elohim Heard and_very_angry and_rejected very in/on/at/with_Yisərāʼēl.

60 And_abandoned tabernacle Shiloh tent/house dwelt in/on/at/with_men.

61 And_he/it_gave to_the_captivity strength_his and_splendor_his in/on/at/with_hand foe.

62 And_gave_~_over to_the_sword people_his and_in/on/at/with_inheritance_his very_angry.

63 Young_men_his fire eating and_young_women_his not had_~_marriagesong.

64 Priests_his in/on/at/with_sword fell and_widows_their not weep.

65 And_awoke as_sleep my_master/master like_warrior shouting of_wine.

66 And_beat adversaries_his back disgrace everlasting he/it_gave them_them.

67 And_rejected in/on/at/with_tent Yōşēf and_in/on/at/with_tribe Ephraim not choose.

68 And_chose DOM tribe Yehuda DOM mount Tsiuōn which/who he/it_loved.

69 And_he/it_built like heights sanctuary_his like_earth established_that to_forever.

70 And_chose in/on/at/with_Dāvid servant_his and_took_him from_pens flock_of_sheep/goats.

71 From_following nursing brought_him to_shepherd in/on/at/with_Yaˊaqov people_his and_in/on/at/with_Yisərāʼēl inheritance_his.

72 And_shepherded_them with_integrity heart_his and_in/on/at/with_skillful hands_his guided_them.

↑ 79  Psalm of_ʼĀşāf Elohim nations they_went in/on/at/with_inheritance_your defiled DOM temple_of holy_your laid DOM Yerushalayim in_ruins.

2 Given DOM bodies your_servants food to_birds the_heavens flesh faithful_your to_beasts_mmm earth.

3 Poured_out blood_their like_the_water all_around Yərūshālayim and_there_was_no bury.

4 Become taunt to_neighbors_our scorn and_derision to_around_us.

5 Until what YHWH angry to_forever burn like fire jealousy_your.

6 Pour_out severe_anger_your to/near the_nations which/who not know_you and_on kingdoms which/who in/on/at/with_name_your not call.

7 That/for/because/then/when devoured DOM Yaakob and_DOM habitation_his laid_waste.

8 Not remember to/for_us iniquities former quickly come_~_tomeet_us compassion_your that/for/because/then/when brought_~_low very.

9 Help_us god salvation_our on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in word/matter_of glory your(ms)_name and_deliver_us and_forgive on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sins_our for_~_sake names_your.

10 To/for_what the_nations say wwww god_their known in/on/at/with_nations before_eyes_our avenging blood your_servants the_outpoured.

11 Come to_your_face groans prisoners according_to_great power_your preserve sons_of die.

12 And_return to_neighbors_our seven_times to/towards bosom_their reproach_their which/who taunted_you my_master/master.

13 And_we people_your and_sheep pasture_your give_thanks to_you to_forever to_generation and_generation recount praise_your.

↑ 80  For_the_director to/towards lilies testimony of_ʼĀşāf psalm.

2 herding_of Yisrael give_ear_mmm lead like_a_flock Yōşēf was_sitting the_cherubim shine_forth_mmm.

3 to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before Ephraim and_Binəyāmīn and_Mənashsheh stir_up_mmm DOM power_your and_come_mmm to_save_mmm to/for_ourselves.

4 Elohim restore_us and_shine face_your and_saved.

5 YHWH Elohim armies/angels until when(q) angry in/on/at/with_prayers people_your.

6 fed_them food/grain/bread tears and_given_~_todrink_them in/on/at/with_tears measure.

7 make_us object_of_contention to_neighbors_our and_enemies_our mock among_themselves.

8 Elohim armies/angels restore_us and_shine face_your and_saved.

9 vine from_Miʦrayim/Miʦərayim/(Egypt) brought_~_out drove_out nations and_planted_it.

10 cleared_the_ground mmm_before_it and_took root_her and_filled land.

11 mountains covered shade_its and_branches_its cedars mighty.

12 sent_out branches_its until sea and_near/to river shoots_its.

13 to/for_what broken_down walls_its and_pick_it all/each/any/every pass_by way.

14 ravages_it boar from_mmm and_creatures field feed_on_it.

15 Elohim armies/angels return now look_down from_heaven and_see and_take_care_of vine this(f).

16 and_root which/who planted right_hand_your and_concerning son made_strong for_yourself.

17 burned in/on/at/with_fire cut_down at_rebuke countenance_your perish.

18 be hand_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in (a)_man right_hand_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in son_of humankind made_strong for_yourself.

19 and_not turn_back from_you revive_us and_in/on/at/with_name_your call.

20 YHWH Elohim armies/angels restore_us shine face_your and_saved.

↑ 81  For_the_director on/upon the_gittith of_ʼĀşāf.

2 sing_for_joy to_god strength_our shout_joyfully to_god Yaakob.

3 raise song and_strike tambourine harp melodious with harp.

4 blow in/on/at/with_new_moon trumpet in/on/at/with_full_moon on_day feast_our.

5 that/for/because/then/when statute for_Yisərāʼēl he/it ordinance of_god Yaakob.

6 decree in/on/at/with_Yōşēf established_it in_his/its_coming_out on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in earth/land Miʦərayim language_of not I_know heard.

7 relieved from_burden shoulder_his hands_his from_basket freed.

8 in/on/at/with_distress called and_rescued_you answered_you in/on/at/with_secret_place thunder tested_you on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in waters Meribah selah.

9 hear people_my and_admonish on/over_you(fs) Yisrael if listen to_me.

10 not will_belong in_you(ms) god strange and_not bow_down to_god foreign.

11 I YHWH god_your the_brought_~_up_you from_land Miʦərayim open_~_wide mouth_your and_fill_it.

12 and_not listen people_my to_voice_my and_Yisərāʼēl not submit to_me.

13 and_gave_~_over_them in/on/at/with_stubborn hearts_their walked in/on/at/with_counsels_their_own.

14 oh_that people_my listen to_me Yisrael in/on/at/with_ways_my walk.

15 as_quickly enemies_their subdue and_against foes_their turn hand_my.

16 hate YHWH cringe to_him/it and_let_it_be fate_their to_forever.

17 and_feed_him with_finest wheat and_from_rock honey satisfy_you.

↑ 83  Song psalm of_ʼĀşāf.

2 Elohim not keep_silent to/for_you(fs) not hold_~_peace and_not still god.

3 that/for/because/then/when see/lo/see.

enemies_your make_an_uproar_mmm and_hate_you raised head.

4 on/upon people_your devise clever_schemes and_consult_together on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in treasured_your.

5 say come and_wipe_~_out_them as_nation and_not remembered name_of Yisrael again/more.

6 that/for/because/then/when conspired mind together against_you covenant make.

7 tents ʼEdom and_Ishmaelites Mōʼāv and_Hagrites.

8 Gebal and_Ammon and_Amalek Philistia with inhabitants Tsor.

9 also/yet Assyria joined with_them they_were help to_children Lōţ selah.

10 make/work/create/deal to/for_them as_Midəyān as_Sisera as_Jabin in/on/at/with_river Kishon.

11 destroyed in/on/at/with_mmm wwww they_were dung for_the_ground.

12 make_them.

nobles_their like_Oreb and_like_Zeeb and_like_Zebah and_like_Zalmunna all/each/any/every princes_their.

13 which/who said take_~_possession to/for_ourselves DOM pastures Elohim.

14 god_my make_them like_the_tumbleweed like_chaff to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before wind.

15 as_fire burns forest and_as_flame sets_~_ablaze mountains.

16 yes/correct/thus/so pursue_them in/on/at/with_tempest_your and_in/on/at/with_storm_your terrify_them.

17 fill faces_their shame and_seek name_your YHWH.

18 ashamed and_dismayed to until and_in_disgrace and_perish.

19 and_know that/for/because/then/when you(ms) name_whose YHWH by_yourself_you most_high on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in all/each/any/every the_earth/land.

17 Make/work/create/deal to_me sign/signal/evidence of_goodness and_see hate_me and_put_to_shame that/for/because/then/when you(ms) YHWH helped_me and_comforted_me.

↑ 88  Song psalm of_sons Korah for_the_director on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in mahalath mmm_leannoth maskil of_Heman the_ˊEzərāʼhite.

2 YHWH god salvation_my day cry_out in/on/at/with_night before_you.

3 come to_your_face prayer_my incline ear_your to_cry_my.

4 that/for/because/then/when full in/on/at/with_troubles soul_my and_life_my to_sheol draws_near.

5 counted with go_down pit am like_man not strength.

6 in/on/at/with_dead forsaken like slain lie grave which/who not remember_them again/more and_they from_hand_your cut_off.

7 put_me in/on/at/with_pit lowest in/on/at/with_dark_places in/on/at/with_depths.

8 upon_me lies_heavy severe_anger_your and_all waves_your overwhelmed selah.

9 caused_~_toshun acquaintances_my from_me made_me repulsive to_them shut_in and_not go_out.

10 eye_my grows_dim from sorrow call_on_you YHWH in_all day spread_out to_you hands_my.

11 .

_for_the_dead you(ms)_will_make wonders if departed_spirits rise_up praise_you selah.

12 the_declared in/on/at/with_grave steadfast_love_your faithfulness_your in/on/at/with_abaddon.

13 .

_known in/on/at/with_darkness wonders_your and_righteousness_your in_land forgetfulness.

14 and_I to_you YHWH cry_out and_in/on/at/with_morning prayer_my comes_before_you.

15 mmm_why.

YHWH reject soul_my hide face_your from_me.

16 afflicted I and_close_to_death from_youth suffer terrors_your desperate.

17 over_me swept severe_anger_your terrors_your destroyed_me.

18 surround_me like_the_water all/each/any/every the_day close_in on_me altogether.

19 removed from_me loved and_friend acquaintances_my darkness.

52 ◘

Igkeep‑at Baad

(Psalm 90–106)

↑ 89  Maskil of_Ethan the_ˊEzərāʼhite.

2 steadfast_love YHWH forever sing to_generation and_generation known faithfulness_your in/on/at/with_mouth_my.

3 that/for/because/then/when declare forever steadfast_love built_up heavens establish faithfulness_your in/on/at/with_them.

4 made covenant with_chosen_my sworn to_Dāvid servant_my.

5 until forever establish descendants_your and_build_up for_generation and_generation throne_your selah.

6 and_ heavens _praise wonders_your YHWH also/though faithfulness_your in/on/at/with_assembly holy.

7 that/for/because/then/when who.

in/on/at/with_skies compare to/for_YHWH like to/for_YHWH in/on/at/with_sons god.

8 god feared in/on/at/with_council holy enough/great(fs) and_awesome on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in all/each/any/every around_him.

9 YHWH god armies/angels who.

like_you mighty LORD and_faithfulness_your surrounds_you.

10 you(ms) rule in/on/at/with_raging the_sea in/on/at/with_rise waves_its you(ms) still_them.

11 you(ms) crushed like_the_slain rahab in/on/at/with_arm mighty_your scattered enemies_your.

12 to/for_yourself(m) heavens also/though to/for_yourself(m) earth world and_all_that_is_in_it you(ms) founded_them.

13 north and_south you(ms) created_them Tabor and_Hermon in/on/at/with_name_your shout_for_joy.

14 to/for_yourself(m) arm with mighty strong hand_your exalted right_hand_your.

15 righteousness and_justice foundation throne_your steadfast_love and_faithfulness go your(ms)_faces/face.

16 blessed the_people know joyful_shout YHWH in/on/at/with_light countenance_your walk_mmm.

17 in/on/at/with_name_your rejoice_mmm all/each/any/every the_day and_in/on/at/with_righteousness_your exalted.

18 that/for/because/then/when glory strength_their you(ms) and_in/on/at/with_favour_your exalted horn_our.

19 that/for/because/then/when to/for_YHWH shield_our and_to_holy Yisrael king_our.

20 then spoke in/on/at/with_vision to_faithful_your and_she/it_said bestowed helper on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in mighty exalted chosen from_people.

21 found Dāvid servant_my in/on/at/with_oil holy_my anointed_him.

22 which/who hand_my established with_him/it also/though arm_my strengthen_him.

23 not deceive enemy in/on/over_him/it and_man wicked not afflict_him.

24 and_crush at_before_him foes_his and_hate_him strike.

25 and_faithfulness_my and_love_my with_him/it and_in/on/at/with_name_my exalted horn_his.

26 and_set in/on/at/with_sea his/its_hand and_in/on/at/with_rivers right_hand_his.

27 he/it cry_me father_my you(ms) god_my and_rock salvation_my.

28 also/though I firstborn make_him highest of_kings earth.

29 to_forever keep to_him/it steadfast_love_my and_covenant_my stand_firm to_him/it.

30 and_establish to_forever his/its_seed and_throne_his as_days heavens.

31 if forsake sons_his law_my and_in/on/at/with_ordinances_my not walk_mmm.

32 if statutes_my violate and_commandments_my not keep.

33 and_punish in/on/at/with_rod transgression_their and_in/on/at/with_stripes iniquity_their.

34 and_steadfast_love_my not break_off from_with_him and_not false in/on/at/with_faithfulness_my.

35 not violate covenant_my and_that_went_forth lips_my not alter.

36 one(fs) sworn in/on/at/with_holiness_my if to_Dāvid lie.

37 his/its_seed to_forever will_belong and_throne_his like_the_sun before_me.

38 like_moon established forever and_witness in/on/at/with_sky faithful selah.

39 and_you(ms) spurned and_rejected full_of_severe_anger with anointed_your.

40 renounced covenant servant_your defiled in_the_dust crown_his.

41 broken_down all walls_his reduced strongholds_his ruins.

42 plunder_him all/each/any/every pass_by road it_became scorn to_neighbors_his.

43 exalted right_hand foes_his rejoice all/each/any/every enemies_his.

44 also/though turned_back edge sword_his and_not supported_him in/on/at/with_battle.

45 to_cease to_splendor_his and_throne_his to_the_ground throw.

46 cut_short days_of youth_his covered on/upon/above_him/it shame selah.

47 until what YHWH hide to_forever burn like fire severe_anger_your.

48 remember I what.

short_~_time on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in what.

vanity created all sons_of humankind.

49 who.

man live and_not he/it_will_see death deliver soul_his from_power sheol selah.

50 wwww steadfast_love_your the_former my_master/master swore to_Dāvid in/on/at/with_faithfulness_your.

51 remember my_master/master mocked your_servants bear_I in/on/at/with_bosom_my all/each/any/every many peoples.

52 which/who taunt enemies_your YHWH which/who taunted footsteps anointed_your.

53 YHWH blessed to_forever amen and_amen.

↑ 90  Prayer of_Mosheh (a)_man the_Elohim my_master/master dwelling_place you(ms) been to/for_ourselves in/on/at/with_generation and_generation.

2 In/on/at/with_before mountains born and_brought_forth earth/land and_world and_from_everlasting until everlasting you(ms) god.

3 Turn_~_back ʼEnōshh until dust and_she/it_said return sons_of humankind.

4 That/for/because/then/when a_thousand years in/on/at/with_sight_your like_day yesterday that/for/because/then/when passes_by and_watch in/on/at/with_night.

5 Sweep_~_away_them sleep are in/on/at/with_morning like_the_grass sprouts_anew.

6 In/on/at/with_morning flourishes and_renewed by_the_evening fades and_dries_up.

7 That/for/because/then/when consumed in/on/at/with_anger_your and_in/on/at/with_severe_anger_your dismayed.

8 Set iniquities_our at_before_you secret_our in_light presence_your.

9 That/for/because/then/when all days_our pass_away in/on/at/with_severe_anger_your come_to_an_end years_our like sigh.

10 Days_of life_our in/among_them seventy year and_if in/on/at/with_strength eighty year and_span_their trouble and_sorrow that/for/because/then/when gone quickly and_fly_away_mmm.

11 Who.

knows power anger_your and_according_to_fear_you severe_anger_your.

12 To_number days_our yes/correct/thus/so he/it_made_known and_gain heart wisdom.

13 Return_mmm YHWH until when.

and_have_compassion on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in servants_your.

14 Satisfy_us in/on/at/with_morning steadfast_love_your and_sing_for_joy and_glad in_all days_our.

15 Make_~_glad_us as_~_as_days afflicted_us years seen evil.

16 Shown to/towards your_servants work_your and_splendor_your on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in children_their.

17 And_let_it_be favour my_master/master god_our upon_us and_work our_both_hands establish_mmm for_us and_work our_both_hands establish_it.

↑ 91  Was_sitting in/on/at/with_shelter most_high in/on/at/with_shadow almighty abide.

3 That/for/because/then/when he/it deliver_you from_snare fowler from_pestilence deadly.

5 Not fear of_terror night of_arrow flies by_day.

7 Fall at_side_your a_thousand and_ten_thousand at_right_hand_your to_you not come_near.

13 On/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in lion and_cobra tread trample young_lion and_serpent.

14 That/for/because/then/when in/on/at/with_me loves and_deliver_him protect_him that/for/because/then/when knowing name_my.

15 Call_upon_me and_answer_him with_him/it I in/on/at/with_trouble rescue_him and_honor_him.

16 Long days satisfy_him and_show_him in/on/at/with_salvation_my.

↑ 102  Prayer of_afflicted when faint and_before_mmm YHWH pours_out lament_his.

2 YHWH hear_mmm prayer_my and_cry_for_help_my to_you come.

3 not hide face_your from_me in/on_day distress to_me incline to_me ear_your in/on_day call quickly answer_me.

4 that/for/because/then/when vanish in/on/at/with_smoke days_my and_bones_my like_mmm a_hearth burn.

5 stricken like_the_grass and_withered heart_my that/for/because/then/when forget to_eat bread_my.

6 because_of_loud groaning_my cling bones_my to_skin_my.

7 like to_owl wilderness am like_owl ruins.

8 lie_awake and_am like_bird lonely on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in roof.

9 all/each/any/every the_day taunt_me enemies_my deride_me in/on/at/with_my curse.

10 that/for/because/then/when ashes like_the_bread eat and_drink_my in/on/at/with_tears mingle.

11 from_face/in_front_of indignation_your and_anger_your that/for/because/then/when picked_~_up_me and_thrown_~_aside_me.

12 days_my like_shadow lengthened and_I like_the_grass wither_away.

13 and_you(ms) YHWH to_forever abide and_name_your to_generation and_generation.

14 you(ms) rise_up have_compassion_on Tsiuōn that/for/because/then/when time to_favour_her that/for/because/then/when appointed_time come.

15 that/for/because/then/when hold_~_dear your_servants DOM stones_her and_DOM dust_its have_pity_on.

16 and_ nations _fear DOM name_of YHWH and_all kings the_earth/land DOM glory_your.

17 that/for/because/then/when YHWH rebuild Tsiuōn he/it_appeared in/on/at/with_glory_his.

18 regard to/towards prayer the_destitute and_not despise DOM prayer_their.

19 written this(f) for_generation to_come and_people created praise LORD.

20 that/for/because/then/when looked_down from_height holy_his YHWH from_heaven to/towards earth/land looked.

21 to_hear groaning prisoners to_set_free sons_of die.

22 so_that_declared in/on/at/with_Tsiuōn name_of YHWH and_praise_his in/on/at/with_Yərūshālayim.

23 in/on/at/with_assemble peoples together and_kingdoms to_serve DOM YHWH.

24 broken in/on/at/with_midcourse strength_my shortened days_my.

25 say god_my not take_~_away_me in/on/at/with_midst life_my in/on/at/with_generation_of generations years_your.

26 in_beginning the_earth/land laid_the_foundation and_work hands_your heavens.

27 they(emph) perish and_you(ms) endure and_all_them like_a_garment wear_out like_the_clothing change_them and_pass_away.

28 and_you(ms) he/it and_years_your not end.

29 sons_of your_servants live and_descendants_their to_your_face established.

↑ 103  Of_Dāvid bless soul_my DOM YHWH and_all within_me DOM name_of holy_his.

2 Bless soul_my DOM YHWH and_not forget all/each/any/every benefits_his.

3 The_forgives to/from_all/each/any/every iniquity_your the_heals to/from_all/each/any/every diseases_your.

4 The_redeems from_pit life_your the_crowns_you steadfast_love and_compassion.

5 The_satisfies in/on/at/with_good things_your renewed like_the_eagles youth_your.

6 Works righteousness YHWH and_justice to/from_all/each/any/every oppressed.

7 Made_known ways_his to_Mosheh to_people Yisrael deeds_his.

8 Compassionate and_gracious YHWH slow anger and_abounding steadfast_love.

9 Not to_always accuse and_not to_forever keep_~_anger.

10 Not according_to_sins_our he/it_had_made to/for_us and_not according_to_iniquities_our repay to_us.

11 That/for/because/then/when as_~_as_ heavens _high on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_earth/land great steadfast_love_his on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in fear_him.

12 As_~_as_ east _far from_west removed from_him/it DOM transgressions_our.

13 As_ father _has_compassion on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sons YHWH has_compassion on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in fear_him.

14 That/for/because/then/when he/it knowing frame_we remembers that/for/because/then/when dust we.

15 ʼEnōshh like_the_grass his/its_days like_flower the_field yes/correct/thus/so flourishes.

16 That/for/because/then/when wind passes in/on/over_him/it and_not_existing_he and_not knows_it again/more place_its.

17 And_steadfast_love YHWH from_long_ago/eternity and_unto everlasting on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in fear_him and_righteousness_his to_children children.

18 To_keep covenant_his and_with_remember precepts_his to_do_them.

19 YHWH in/on/at/with_heavens established throne_his and_kingdom_his in/on/at/with_all rules.

20 Bless YHWH angels_his mighty strength do word_his by_obeying in/on/at/with_voice word_his.

21 Bless YHWH all/each/any/every hosts_his servants_his do will_his.

22 Bless YHWH all/each/any/every works_his in_all places dominion_his bless soul_my DOM YHWH.

↑ 104  Bless soul_my DOM YHWH YHWH god_my great very splendor and_majesty clothed.

2 Wraps light as_a_garment stretch_out heavens like_a_tent.

3 The_lays_the_beams in/on/at/with_waters upper_chambers_his the_makes clouds chariot_his the_rides on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in wings wind.

4 Producing messengers_his winds ministers_his fire flame.

5 Established earth/land on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in foundations_its not moved forever and_ever.

6 Deep as_a_garment covered_it on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in mountains waters they_will_stand.

7 From/more_than rebuke_your fled_mmm from/more_than sound/voice thunder_your hurried_away_mmm.

8 Rose mountains sank_down valleys to/towards place/spot this established to/for_them.

9 Border set not cross_mmm not again_mmm to_cover the_earth/land.

10 The_gush_forth springs in/on/at/with_valleys between mountains flow_mmm.

11 Give_drink all/each/any/every beast_mmm field wild_donkeys quench thirst_their.

12 Beside_them bird the_heavens dwell from_among branches lift_up sound/voice.

13 Waters mountains from_upper_chambers_his from_the_fruit work_your the_earth/land satisfied.

14 Grow grass for_the_cattle and_plants for_cultivate the_humankind to_bring_forth food/grain/bread from/more_than the_earth/land.

15 And_wine gladden heart ʼEnōshh to_shine face with_oil and_bread heart ʼEnōshh sustains.

16 Watered_abundantly tree/wood_of YHWH cedars Lebanon which/who planted.

17 Which/who there birds build_~_nests stork fir_trees home_its.

18 Mountains the_high for_the_wild_goats cliffs refuge for_the_coneys.

19 He/it_had_made moon to_seasons sun knowing setting_its.

20 Make darkness and_ night _becomes in/on/over_him/it creep_about all/each/any/every animals_mmm forest.

21 The_young_lions roar for_their_prey and_to_seek from_god food_their.

22 the_sun Rises withdraw_mmm and_near/to dens_their lie_down_mmm.

23 humankind Goes_out to_work_his and_to_labor_his until evening.

24 What many works_your YHWH all_them in/on/at/with_wisdom you(ms)_have_done/made the_earth/land she/it_is_full creatures_your.

25 This the_sea big/great and_spacious_of hands there creeping_(thing)_of and_without number living_things small with great.

26 There ships go_mmm leviathan which formed to_play in/on/over_him/it.

27 All_them to_you look_mmm to_give food_their in/on/at/with_due_season_him.

28 Give to/for_them gather_~_up_mmm open hand_your satisfied_mmm good.

29 Hide face_your dismayed_mmm take_away breath_their die_mmm and_near/to dust_their return_mmm.

30 Send_forth spirit_your created_mmm and_renew face/surface_of soil/ground.

31 Let_it_be glory YHWH to_forever YHWH rejoice in/on/at/with_works_his.

32 The_looks at_the_earth and_trembles touches in/on/at/with_mountains and_smoke.

33 Sing to/for_YHWH in/on/at/with_life_my sing_praise to_god_my in/on/at/with_have_being_I.

34 Pleasing on/upon/above_him/it meditation_my I rejoice in/on/at/with_LORD.

35 Consumed sinners from/more_than the_earth/land and_wicked again/more no_they bless soul_my DOM YHWH praise master.

↑ 105  Give_thanks to/for_YHWH call in/on/at/with_name_his known in/on/at/with_peoples deeds_his.

2 Sing to_him/it sing_praises to_him/it tell in_all wonderful_his.

3 Glory in/on_name_of holy_his rejoice hearts seek YHWH.

4 Seek YHWH and_strength_his seek face_his continually.

5 Remember wonders_his which/who he/it_had_made miracles_his and_judgments pronounced_he.

6 Seed/offspring ʼAvərāhām servant_his sons_of Yaakob chosen_his.

7 He/it YHWH god_our in_all the_earth/land judgments_his.

8 Remembers to_forever covenant_his word commanded for_a_thousand generations.

9 Which/who made DOM ʼAvərāhām and_oath_his to_Yiʦəḩāq.

10 And_confirmed_it to_Yaˊaqov as_statute to_Yisərāʼēl covenant everlasting.

11 To_say to/for_yourself(m) give DOM land_of Kenaan portion inheritance_your.

12 On_their_being few number of_little and_strangers in/on/at/with_it.

13 And_wandering from_nation to/towards nation from_kingdom to/towards people next/another.

14 Not allowed humankind to_oppress_them and_rebuked on_~_account_their kings.

15 Not touch in/on/at/with_anointed_my and_to_prophets_my not do_~_harm.

16 And_he/it_called famine on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in the_earth/land all/each/any/every supply food/grain/bread broke.

17 Shalah on_ahead_of_them (a)_man as_slave Yōşēf sold.

18 Hurt in/on/at/with_fetters feet_his irons put_in neck_his.

19 Until time came_to_pass word_his word YHWH tested_him.

20 king Shalah and_released_him ruler peoples and_set_~_free_him.

21 Made_him master of_house_his and_ruler in_all possessions_his.

22 To_instruct officials_his in/on/at/with_pleasure_he and_elders_his teach_~_wisdom.

23 And_ Yisrael _came Miʦərayim/(Egypt) and_Yaˊaqov lived_as_an_alien in_land_of Ham.

24 And_made_~_fruitful DOM people_his very and_stronger_them than_foes_their.

25 Turned hearts_whose to_hate people_his to_deal_craftily in/on/at/with_servants_his.

26 Shalah Mosheh servant_his ʼAharon which/who chosen in/on/over_him/it.

27 Performed in/on/at/with_them words signs_his and_miracles in_land Ham.

28 Sent darkness and_made_~_dark and_not rebel_against DOM words_his.

29 turned DOM waters_their into_blood and_die DOM fish_their.

30 Swarmed land_their frogs in/on/at/with_chambers kings_their.

31 He/it_had_said and_ swarms_of_flies _came gnats in_all country_their.

32 He/it_gave rain_them hail lightning flashed in/on/at/with_land_their.

33 And_struck vines_their and_fig_trees_their and_shattered tree/word territory_their.

34 He/it_had_said and_ I_will_increase _came and_young_locusts and_without number.

35 And_ate_up all/each/any/every plant in/on/at/with_land_their and_ate_up fruit(sg) ground_their.

36 And_struck_down all/each/any/every firstborn in/on/at/with_land_their beginning_of to/from_all/each/any/every strength_their.

37 And_brought_~_out_them in/on/at/with_silver and_gold and_no in/on/at/with_tribes_his stumbled.

38 Miʦərayim Glad in/on/at/with_departed_they that/for/because/then/when fallen dread_them upon_them.

39 Spread cloud for_covering and_fire to_give_light night.

40 Asked and_he/it_brought quail and_bread heaven satisfied_them.

41 Opened rock and_ water _gushed_out flowed in/on/at/with_wilderness river.

42 That/for/because/then/when remembered DOM word/matter_of holy_his DOM ʼAvərāhām servant_his.

43 And_brought_~_out people_his in/on/at/with_joy in/on/at/with_shouts_of_joy DOM chosen_his.

44 And_he/it_gave to/for_them lands nations and_what_~_worked peoples inherited.

45 In_account_of keep statutes_his and_laws_his observe praise master.

Ikalimma Baad

(Psalm 107–150)

↑ 106  Praise master give_thanks to/for_YHWH that/for/because/then/when good that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

2 Who.

utter mighty_deeds YHWH declare all/each/any/every praise_his.

3 Blessed observe justice do righteousness in/on/at/with_all times.

4 Remember_me YHWH in/on/at/with_favour people_your help_me in/on/at/with_deliver_you.

5 To_see in/on/at/with_prosperity chosen_your that_rejoice in/on/at/with_joy nation_your that_glory with inheritance_your.

6 Sinned with fathers_our committed_iniquity acted_wickedly.

7 fathers_our in/on/at/with_Miʦərayim/(Egypt) not understand wondrous_your not remember DOM many kindnesses_your and_rebelled on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in sea in/on/at/with_Sea_of Reed.

8 And_saved_them for_~_sake his/its_name to_known DOM mighty_power_his.

9 And_rebuked in/on/at/with_sea red and_dried_up and_led_them in/on/at/with_deep as_the_wilderness.

10 And_saved_them from_hand foe and_redeemed_them from_hand enemy.

11 And_ waters _covered adversaries_their one(ms) from_them not left.

12 And_believed in/on/at/with_words_his sang praise_his.

13 Soon forgot works_his not wait for_counsel_his.

14 And_they_craved craving in/on/at/with_wilderness and_put_~_tothe_test god in/on/at/with_wilderness.

15 And_he/it_gave to/for_them what_~_askedfor_they and_sent wasting_disease in/on/at/with_souls_their.

16 And_jealous of_Mosheh in/on/at/with_camp of_ʼAharon holy YHWH.

17 earth/land Opened and_swallowed_up Dathan and_covered on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in company Abiram.

18 And_ fire _blazed in/on/at/with_company_their flame consumed wicked.

19 Made calf in/on/at/with_Horeb and_worshiped to_throw_image.

20 And_exchanged DOM glory_their in/on/at/with_image ox eats plant.

21 Forgot god saviour_their producing great in/on/at/with_Miʦərayim.

22 Wondrous in_land Ham awesome on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in Sea_of Reed.

23 And_he/it_said that_destroy_them not Mosheh chosen_his stood in/on/at/with_breach before_mmm_him to_turn_away severe_anger_his from_destroying.

24 And_despised in_land pleasant not believe in_promise_his.

25 And_grumbled in/on/at/with_tents_their not obey in/on/at/with_voice YHWH.

26 And_raised his/its_hand to/for_them that_fall mmm_them in/on/at/with_wilderness.

27 And_to_disperse descendants_their in/on/at/with_nations and_to_scatter_them in/on/at/with_lands.

28 And_attached to_mmm wwww and_ate sacrifices dead.

29 And_provoked_~_toanger in/on/at/with_deeds_their and_broke_out in/on/at/with_them plague.

30 And_ Phinehas _stood_up and_intervened and_ the_plague _stopped.

31 And_reckoned to_him/it as_righteousness throughout_generation and_generation until forever.

32 And_angered on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in waters Meribah and_went_ill with_Mosheh in/on/at/with_mmm_them.

33 That/for/because/then/when rebelled_against DOM his/its_breath/wind/spirit and_spoke_rashly in/on/at/with_lips_his.

34 Not destroy DOM the_peoples which/who YHWH he/it_had_said to/for_them.

35 And_mingled in/on/at/with_nations and_learned did_their.

36 And_served DOM idols_their and_they_were to/for_them as_snare.

37 And_sacrificed DOM sons_their and_DOM daughters_their to_the_demons.

38 And_shed blood innocent blood sons_their and_daughters_their which/who sacrificed to_idols Kinaˊan and_ the_earth/land _polluted in/on/at/with_blood.

39 And_became_unclean in/on/at/with_acts_their and_prostituted in/on/at/with_deeds_their.

40 And_it_glowed/burned also/though YHWH in/on/at/with_people_his and_abhorred DOM inheritance_his.

41 And_gave_them in/on/at/with_hand nations and_ruled in/among_them hated_them.

42 And_oppressed_them enemies_their and_subdued below/instead_of power_their.

43 Times many delivered_them and_they rebellious in/on/at/with_counsel_their and_brought_low in/on/at/with_iniquity_their.

44 And_he/it_saw in/on/at/with_distress to/for_them in/on/at/with_heard_he DOM cry_their.

45 And_remembered to/for_them covenant_his and_relented according_to_abundance steadfast_love_his.

46 And_he/it_gave mmm_them to_pitied to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before all/each/any/every captors_their.

47 Save_us YHWH god_our and_gather_us from/more_than the_nations so_that_give_thanks to_name holy_your to_glory in/on/at/with_praise_your.

48 Blessed YHWH god Yisrael from/more_than the_everlasting and_unto the_everlasting and_saying(ms) all/each/any/every the_people amen praise master.

↑ 107  Give_thanks to/for_YHWH that/for/because/then/when good that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

2 Say redeemed YHWH which/who redeemed_them from_hand foe.

3 And_from_lands gathered_them from_east and_from_west from_north and_from_south.

4 Wandered in/on/at/with_wilderness in/on/at/with_wastes way (a)_city inhabited not finding.

5 Hungry also/yet thirsty soul_their (is)_in_them fainted.

6 And_cried_out to/towards YHWH in/on/at/with_trouble to/for_them from_distress_their delivered_them.

7 And_led_them in/on/at/with_way straight to_go to/towards (a)_city inhabited.

8 Give_thanks to/for_YHWH steadfast_love_his and_wondrous_his for_children humankind.

9 That/for/because/then/when satisfies creature longing and_soul hungry fills_with good.

10 Sat darkness and_gloom prisoners misery and_iron.

11 That/for/because/then/when rebelled_against words god and_counsel most_high spurned.

12 And_humbled in/on/at/with_hard_labor hearts_their stumbled and_there_was_no help.

13 And_cried to/towards YHWH in/on/at/with_trouble to/for_them from_distress_their saved_them.

14 Brought_~_out_them of_darkness and_gloom and_bonds_their broke_~_apart.

15 Give_thanks to/for_YHWH steadfast_love_his and_wondrous_his for_children humankind.

16 That/for/because/then/when shatters gates copper/brass/bronze//coin and_bars iron cuts_through.

17 Fools through_ways rebellious_their and_because_of_iniquities_their suffered_affliction.

18 All/each/any/every food loathed soul_their and_drew_near until gates death.

19 And_cried to/towards YHWH in/on/at/with_trouble to/for_them from_distress_their saved_them.

20 He/it_will_send_out/away word_his and_healed_them and_delivered from_destruction_their.

21 give_thanks to/for_YHWH steadfast_love_his and_wondrous_his for_children humankind.

22 and_offer sacrifices thanksgiving and_tell works_his in/on/at/with_songs_of_joy.

23 went_down the_sea in/on/at/with_ships doing business in/on/at/with_waters great.

24 they(emph) saw works YHWH and_wondrous_his in/on/at/with_deep.

25 and_he/it_said and_raised wind stormy and_lifted_up waves_its.

26 mounted_up heavens went_down depths courage_their in/on/at/with_calamity melted_away.

27 Reeled and_staggered like_a_drunken and_all wits_their at_~_end.

28 And_cried_out to/towards YHWH in/on/at/with_trouble to/for_them and_of_distress_their brought_~_out_them.

29 Stilled storm to_whisper and_hushed waves_their.

30 And_glad because quiet and_guided_them to/towards haven desired_their.

31 Give_thanks to/for_YHWH steadfast_love_his and_wondrous_his for_children humankind.

32 And_exalt_him in/on/at/with_congregation people and_in/on/at/with_assembly elders praise_him.

33 Turns rivers into_wilderness and_springs waters into_thirsty_ground.

34 Earth/land fruit(sg) into_salt_waste because_of_wickedness inhabitants in/on/at/with_its.

35 Turns wilderness into_pool waters and_land dry into_springs water.

36 And_live there hungry and_establish (a)_city live.

37 And_sow fields and_plant vineyards and_they_made fruit(sg) harvest.

38 And_blesses_them and_multiply very and_cattle_their not decrease.

39 And_diminished and_brought_low through_oppression calamity and_sorrow.

40 pours contempt on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in princes and_wander_them in/on/at/with_waste not track.

41 And_raises_up needy out_of_affliction and_he/it_assigned like_a_flocks families.

42 See upright and_glad and_all wickedness shuts her/its_mouth.

43 Who.

wise and_give_heed these and_consider steadfast_love YHWH.

↑ 108  Song psalm of_Dāvid.

↑ 109  For_the_choir_director of_Dāvid psalm god praise_my not silent.

2 That/for/because/then/when mouths wicked and_mouths deceitful against_me opened speak against_me tongues lying.

3 And_words hate surround_me and_attack_me without_cause.

4 In_return_for love_my accuse_me and_I prayer.

5 And_repay against_me evil below/instead_of good and_hatred below/instead_of love_my.

6 Appoint on/upon/above_him/it wicked and_accuser stand on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in right_hand_his.

7 In/on/at/with_judged_he come_forth guilty and_prayer_his you(ms)_will_be as_sin.

8 Be his/its_days few office_his take next/another.

9 Be children_his fatherless and_his/its_woman/wife widow.

10 And_to_wander wander children_his and_beg and_searching from_ruined_homes_their.

11 Seize creditor to/from_all/each/any/every which/who to_him/it and_plunder strangers fruits_of_~_toil_his.

12 Not let_it_be to_him/it extend kindness and_no let_it_be gracious to_fatherless_children_his.

13 Let_it_be descendants_his to_cut_off in/on/at/with_generation next/another blotted_out their_name.

14 Remembered iniquity fathers_his to/towards YHWH and_sin his/its_mother not blotted_out.

15 Be before YHWH continually and_cut_off from_earth memory_them.

16 For which/who not remember to_make kindness and_pursued (a)_man poor and_needy and_despondent heart to_put_~_todeath.

17 And_loved cursing and_come_on_him and_not delight in/on/at/with_blessing and_far from_him.

18 And_wore cursing as_coat_his and_enter like_the_water in/on/at/with_body_his and_like_the_oil in/on/at/with_bones_his.

19 Be to_him/it like_garment wraps and_like_belt every_day wears_him.

20 This(f) reward accusers_my from_with YHWH and_the_speak evil on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in life_my.

21 And_you(ms) master my_master/master make/work/create/deal with_me for_~_sake your(ms)_name that/for/because/then/when good love_your deliver_me.

22 That/for/because/then/when poor and_needy I and_heart_my wounded in/on/at/with_within_me.

23 Like_shadow when_lengthening_it fade_away shaken_off like_the_locust.

24 Knees_my weak from_fasting and_body_my become_gaunt without_fat.

25 And_I am object_of_scorn to/for_them see_me shake_mmm heads_their.

26 Help_me YHWH god_my save_me according_to_steadfast_love_your.

27 And_know that/for/because/then/when hand_your this you(ms) YHWH done_it.

28 Curse they(emph) and_you(ms) bless arise and_put_to_shame and_servant_your glad.

29 Clothed accusers_my disgrace and_wrapped as_a_cloak shame_their_own.

30 Give_thanks YHWH very in/on/at/with_mouth_my and_in/on/at/with_midst many praise_him.

31 That/for/because/then/when stands at_right_hand needy to_save from_condemn life_his.

↑ 118  Give_thanks to/for_YHWH that/for/because/then/when good that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

2 Say now Yisrael that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

3 Say now house_of ʼAharon that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

4 Say now fear YHWH that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

5 From/more_than the_distress called LORD answered_me in/on/at/with_broad_place master.

6 YHWH to_me not fear what.

do to_me humankind.

7 YHWH to_me in/on/at/with_helper_my and_I look in/on/at/with_hate_me.

8 Good to_take_refuge in/on/at/with_LORD than_trust in/on/at/with_man.

9 Good to_take_refuge in/on/at/with_LORD than_trust in/on/at/with_princes.

10 All/each/any/every nations surrounded_me in/on_name_of YHWH that/for/because/then/when cut_~_off_them.

11 Surrounded_me also/even surrounded_me in/on_name_of YHWH that/for/because/then/when cut_~_off_them.

12 Surrounded_me like_bees extinguished like_fire thorns in/on_name_of YHWH that/for/because/then/when cut_~_off_them.

13 To_push_back you_pushed_back_me to_fall and_LORD helped_me.

14 Strength_my and_song LORD and_he/it_was to_me as_salvation.

15 Sound/voice joy and_victory in/on/at/with_tents righteous right_hand YHWH does valiantly.

16 Right_hand YHWH exalted right_hand YHWH does valiantly.

17 Not die that/for/because/then/when live and_proclaim works LORD.

18 To_chasten he_chastened_me LORD and_to_the_death not given_~_over_me.

19 Open to_me gates righteousness enter in/on/at/with_them give_thanks LORD.

20 This the_gate to/for_YHWH righteous they_went in_him/it.

21 Give_thanks_you that/for/because/then/when answered_me and_it_became to_me as_salvation.

22 Stone rejected the_builders she/it_was as_chief cornerstone.

23 From_with YHWH she/it_was this she/it marvellous in/on/at/with_eyes_our.

24 This the_day YHWH he/it_had_made rejoice and_glad in_him/it.

25 Oh YHWH save_mmm we_beseech_you o YHWH grant_~_success_mmm please.

26 Blessed the_comes in/on_name_of YHWH bless_you from_house YHWH.

27 god YHWH and_given_~_light to/for_us bind festal_procession in/on/at/with_cords until horns the_altar.

28 god_my you(ms) and_give_thanks_you god_my exalt_you.

29 Give_thanks to/for_YHWH that/for/because/then/when good that/for/because/then/when to_forever steadfast_love_his.

↑ 119  Blessed blameless way the_walk in/on/at/with_law YHWH.

↑ 123  Song the_ascents to_you lift_up DOM eyes_my the_enthroned in/on/at/with_heavens.

↑ 139  For_the_choir_director of_Dāvid psalm YHWH searched_me and_known.

2 You(ms) know sit_down_I and_rise_up_I understand to_thoughts_my from_afar.

3 Path_my and_lying_down_my search_out and_all ways_my acquainted.

4 That/for/because/then/when not word in/on/at/with_tongue_my if YHWH know completely_it.

5 Behind and_before hem_~_in_me and_laid upon_me hand_your.

7 Where go from_spirit_your and_where from_presence_your flee.

8 If ascend heaven there you(ms) and_make_~_bed sheol there_you.

9 Take wings dawn settle in_end/latter sea.

10 Also/yet there hand_your lead_me and_hold_me right_hand_your.

11 And_say surely darkness cover_me and_night light around_me.

12 Also/yet darkness not dark to_you and_night as_the_day bright mmm_mmm mmm_mmm.

13 That/for/because/then/when you(ms) created inward_parts_my knit_~_together_me in/on/at/with_womb mothers_my.

14 Praise_you on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in that/for/because/then/when fearfully wonderfully_made wonderful works_your and_soul_my know very.

15 Not hidden frame_my from_you which/who made in/on/at/with_secret intricately_woven in/on/at/with_depths earth.

16 Formless_my saw eyes_your and_in book_your all_them written days ordained and_before one(ms) in/on/at/with_them.

17 And_to_me what.

precious thoughts_your god what.

vast sum_them.

18 Count_them than_sand more_mmm awake and_still_I with_you.

19 If kill god wicked and_men bloodthirsty depart from_me.

20 Which/who speak_you with_evil_intent take in_the_vain enemies_your.

21 Am_not hate_you YHWH hate and_in/on/at/with_rise_up_against_you loathe.

22 Complete hatred hate_them as_enemies they_were to_me.

23 Search_me god and_know heart_my test_me and_know anxious_thoughts_my.

24 And_see if way offensive in/on/at/with_me and_lead_me in/on/at/with_way everlasting.

↑ 140  For_the_choir_director psalm of_Dāvid.

2 rescue_me YHWH from_humankind evil from_man violent preserve_me.

3 which/who plan evil in/on/at/with_hearts all/each/any/every day stir_up wars.

4 make_~_sharp tongues_their as snakes venom vipers below/instead_of lips_their selah.

5 protect_me YHWH from_hands wicked from_man violent preserve_me which/who planned to_make_~_stumble feet_my.

6 hidden proud trap to_me and_cords spread net by_side_of path snares set to_me selah.

7 say to/for_YHWH god_my you(ms) give_ear_mmm YHWH sound/voice supplications_my.

8 master my_master/master strong salvation_my covered over_head_my in/on_day battle.

9 not grant YHWH desires wicked evil_plot_their not further exalted selah.

10 head surround_me mischief lips_their overwhelm_them.

11 fall on_them burning_coals in/on/at/with_fire thrown_them in/on/at/with_miry_pits never rise.

12 (a)_man slander not established on_the_earth (a)_man violence/cruelty evil hunt_down_him in_thrusts.

13 know that/for/because/then/when YHWH he/it_made/did cause afflicted justice needy.

14 surely righteous give_thanks to_name_your live upright DOM presence_your.

↑ 141  Psalm of_Dāvid YHWH call_on_you hasten_mmm to/for_me give_ear_mmm my_sound/voice in/on/at/with_call_I to/for_you(fs).

2 Set prayer_my incense to_your_face lifting_up hands_my offering evening.

3 Set_mmm YHWH guard over_mouth_my keep_watch_mmm on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in door lips_my.

4 Not incline heart_my to_thing evil to_practice deeds in/on/at/with_wicked DOM men work iniquity and_not eat in/on/at/with_delicacies_their.

5 Strike_me law-abiding/just kindness and_rebuke_me oil head not refuse my_head that/for/because/then/when again/more and_prayer_my in/on/at/with_wicked_deeds_their.

6 Thrown_down in/on/at/with_sides cliff judges_their and_learn words_my that/for/because/then/when pleasant.

7 As plows and_breaks_up on_the_earth scattered bones_our at_mouth sheol.

8 That/for/because/then/when toward_you GOD my_master/master eyes_my in/on/at/with_you seek_refuge not leave_~_defenseless soul_my.

9 Keep_me from_grasp trap laid to_me and_snares do iniquity.

10 Fall in/on/at/with_nets_their_own wicked alone I while pass_by.

↑ 142  Maskil of_Dāvid in/on/at/with_was_he in/on/at/with_cave prayer.

2 my_sound/voice to/towards YHWH cry my_sound/voice to/towards YHWH make_supplication.

3 pour_out mmm_before_him complaint_my trouble_my before_mmm_him tell.

4 in/on/at/with_faints within_me my_breath/wind/spirit and_you(ms) know way_my in/on/at/with_path where walk hidden trap to_me.

5 look right and_see and_no to_me takes_notice refuge there_is_no for_me not cares for_soul_my.

6 cry to_you YHWH say you(ms) refuge_my portion_my in_land the_life.

7 listen_mmm to/near cry_my that/for/because/then/when brought_~_low very deliver_me from_persecutors_my that/for/because/then/when strong too_~_for_me.

8 bring_mmm out_of_prison soul_my so_that_give_thanks DOM your(ms)_name in/on/at/with_me surround righteous that/for/because/then/when deal_bountifully with_me.

↑ 143  Psalm of_Dāvid YHWH hear prayer_my listen_mmm to/towards supplications_my in/on/at/with_faithfulness_your answer_me in/on/at/with_righteousness_your.

2 And_not enter in/on/at/with_judgment DOM servant_your that/for/because/then/when not righteous to_your_face all living_(creature).

3 That/for/because/then/when pursued enemy soul_my crushed to_the_ground life_my dwell_me in/on/at/with_darkness like_dead long.

4 And_grows_faint within_me my_breath/wind/spirit in/on/at/with_within_me appalled heart_my.

5 Remember days from_east meditate in/on/at/with_all doings_your in/on/at/with_work hands_your muse.

6 Stretch_out hands_my to_you soul_my like_land parched to/for_yourself(m) selah.

7 Quickly answer_me YHWH fails my_breath/wind/spirit not hide face_your from_me and_like with go_down pit.

8 Hear_me in/on/at/with_morning steadfast_love_your that/for/because/then/when in_you(ms) trust teach_me way that go that/for/because/then/when to_you lift_up soul_my.

9 Deliver_me from_enemies_my YHWH in_you take_refuge.

10 Teach_me to_do will_your that/for/because/then/when you(ms) god_my spirit_your good lead_me in_land level.

11 For_~_sake names_your YHWH preserve_~_life_my in/on/at/with_righteousness_your bring out_of_trouble soul_my.

12 And_in/on/at/with_steadfast_love_your cut_off enemies_my and_destroy all/each/any/every adversaries soul_my that/for/because/then/when I servant_your.

↑ 144  Of_Dāvid blessed YHWH rock_my the_trains hands_my for_THE_war fingers_my for_the_battle.

2 Faithful_love_my and_fortress_my stronghold_my and_deliverer_my to_me shield_my and_in/on/at/with_whom take_refuge the_subdues peoples_my under_me.

3 YHWH what humankind and_care_for_him son_of ʼEnōshh and_think_of_him.

4 Humankind to_a_breath like his/its_days like_shadow passing.

5 YHWH bow heavens_your and_come_down touch in/on/at/with_mountains and_smoke.

6 Flash_forth lightning and_scatter_them send_out arrows_your and_rout_them.

7 Stretch_out hand_your from_on_high rescue_me and_deliver_me from_waters mighty from_hand sons_of foreign.

8 Which/who mouths_them he/it_had_said lies and_right_hand_whose right_hand false.

9 Elohim song new sing to_you in/on/at/with_harp ten-stringed play to_you.

10 The_gives victory to_the_kings the_rescues DOM Dāvid servant_his from_sword deadly.

11 Rescue_me and_deliver_me from_hand sons_of foreign which/who mouths_them he/it_had_said lies and_right_hands_whose right_hand false.

12 Which/who sons_our like_plants full_grown in/on/at/with_youth_their daughters_our like_corner_pillars carved style palace.

13 Barns_our full providing of_kind to/towards kind sheep_our increase_by_thousands tens_of_thousands in/on/at/with_fields_our.

14 Cattle_our be_heavy_with_young not breach and_no exile and_no cry_of_distress in/on/at/with_streets_our.

15 Blessed the_people who_such for_him/it blessed the_people whose_LORD his/its_god.

↑ 145  Praise of_Dāvid exalt_you god_my the_king and_I_will_bless name_your for_ever and_ever.

2 In_all day bless_you and_praise name_your for_ever and_ever.

3 Big/great YHWH and_praised very and_to_greatness_his not fathom.

4 Generation to_generation laud works_your and_mighty_acts_your declare.

5 Splendor glorious majesty_your and_works wonderful_your meditate.

6 And_power awesome_your speak and_greatness_your declare_mmm.

7 Fame great//chief/captain goodness_your utter and_righteousness_your sing_aloud.

8 Gracious and_compassionate YHWH slow anger and_great steadfast_love.

9 Good YHWH to_the_all and_compassion_his on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in all/each/any/every made_he.

10 Give_thanks_you YHWH all/each/any/every works_your and_faithful_your bless_you.

11 Glory kingdom_your speak and_power_your tell.

12 To_known to_children the_humankind mighty_acts_his and_glorious splendor his/its_kingdom.

13 kingdom_your kingdom all/each/any/every everlasting and_dominion_your in_all generation and_generation.

14 YHWH Upholds to/from_all/each/any/every the_fall and_raises_up to/from_all/each/any/every the_bowed_down.

15 Both_eyes_of all to_you look and_you(ms) give to/for_them DOM food_their in/on/at/with_proper_time_him.

16 Open DOM hand_your and_satisfy to/from_all/each/any/every he/it_lived desire.

17 Law-abiding/just YHWH in_all ways_his and_kind in_all works_his.

18 Near YHWH to/from_all/each/any/every call_on_him to_all/each/any/every which/who call_on_him in/on/at/with_truth.

19 Desire fear_him he/it_made/did and_DOM cry_their hears and_saves_them.

20 YHWH Watches_over DOM all/each/any/every love_him and_DOM all/each/any/every the_wicked destroy.

21 Praise YHWH speak mouth_my and_bless all/each/any/every flesh/meat name_of holy_his for_ever and_ever.

↑ 146  Praise master praise soul_my DOM YHWH.

2 Praise YHWH in/on/at/with_live_I sing_praises to_god_my in/on/at/with_as_long_as_I.

3 Not put_~_trust in/on/at/with_princes in/on/at/with_son humankind whom_there_is_no to_him/it save.

4 Departs his/its_breath/wind/spirit returns to_earth_his in_the_day (the)_that perish plans_his.

5 Blessed he_god Yaakob in/on/at/with_help_whose hope_whose on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in YHWH his/its_god.

6 Producing heaven and_earth DOM the_sea and_DOM all/each/any/every which/who in/on/at/with_them the_keeps faith to_forever.

7 Producing justice for_the_oppressed gives food/grain/bread to_the_hungry YHWH sets_~_free prisoners.

8 YHWH opens blind YHWH raises_up bowed_down YHWH loves righteous.

9 YHWH he/it_was_watching DOM strangers fatherless and_widow upholds and_way wicked frustrates.

10 YHWH Reign to_forever god_your Tsiuōn for_generation and_generation praise master.

↑ 147  Praise master that/for/because/then/when good sing_praises god_our that/for/because/then/when pleasant fitting praise.

2 Builds_up Yerushalayim YHWH outthrows Yisrael gathers.

3 The_heals to_ones_being_broken_of heart and_binds_up to_wounds_their.

4 Counts number of_the_stars to/for_all_them names he/it_called/named.

5 Big/great master_our and_abundant ability to_understanding_his not limit.

6 Helps humble YHWH throws wicked to ground.

7 Sing to/for_YHWH in/on/at/with_thanksgiving sing_praises to_god_our in/on/at/with_lyre.

8 The_covers heavens in/on/at/with_clouds the_prepares for_the_earth rain the_grow hills grass.

9 Gives to_animals food_their to_young ravens which/who cry.

10 Not in/on/at/with_strength the_horse delight not in/on/at/with_legs the_man pleasure.

11 YHWH Takes_pleasure DOM fear_him DOM the_hope in_steadfast_love_his.

12 Praise Yerushalayim DOM YHWH praise god_your Tsiuōn.

13 That/for/because/then/when strengthens bars gates_your blesses children_your in/on/at/with_within_you.

14 The_makes borders_your peace finest wheat satisfies_you.

15 The_sends_out command_his earth until swiftly runs word_his.

16 The_gives snow like_the_wool frost like_the_ashes scatters.

17 Hurls_down hail_his like_crumbs to_(the)_face_of/in_front_of/before cold_his who.

stand.

18 He/it_will_send_out/away word_his and_melts_them blow his/its_breath/wind/spirit waters flow.

19 Declares word_his to_Yaˊaqov statutes_his and_ordinances_his to_Yisərāʼēl.

20 Not he/it_had_made so to/from_all/each/any/every nation and_ordinances not know_his praise master.

↑ 148  Praise master praise DOM YHWH from/more_than the_heavens praise_him in/on/at/with_heights.

2 Praise_him all angels_his praise_him all/each/any/every hosts_his.

3 Praise_him sun and_moon praise_him all/each/any/every stars light.

4 Praise_him heavens_of the_heavens and_the_waters which/who from_under the_heavens.

5 Praise DOM name_of YHWH that/for/because/then/when he/it commanded and_created.

6 And_established_them for_ever to_ever decree he/it_gave and_not pass_away.

7 Praise DOM YHWH from/more_than the_earth/land sea_monsters and_all deeps.

8 Fire and_hail snow and_cloud wind stormy fulfilling command_his.

9 The_mountains and_all hills tree/word fruit(sg) and_all cedars.

10 The_wild_animals and_all cattle/livestock creeping_(thing)_of and_birds wing/corner/skirt.

11 kings earth/land and_all peoples princes and_all judges earth.

12 Young_men and_also young_women old with young.

13 Praise DOM name_of YHWH that/for/because/then/when exalted his/its_name for_him/it_being_alone splendor_his on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in earth/land and_heavens.

14 And_raised_up horn for_people_his praise to/from_all/each/any/every faithful_his for_people Yisrael people close_to_him praise master.

↑ 149  Praise master sing to/for_YHWH song new praise_his in/on/at/with_assembly faithful.

2 Yisrael Glad in/on/at/with_maker_its sons_of Tsiuōn rejoice in/on/at/with_king_their.

4 That/for/because/then/when YHWH takes_pleasure in/on/at/with_people_his adorns humble in/on/at/with_salvation.

5 Exult faithful in/on/at/with_glory sing_for_joy on/upon/above/on_account_of//he/it_went_in beds_their.

6 High_praises god in/on/at/with_mouths_their and_sword double-edged in/on/at/with_hands_their.

7 For_doing vengeance in/on/at/with_nations punishment on peoples.

8 To_bind kings_their in/on/at/with_chains and_nobles_their in/on/at/with_fetters iron.

9 For_doing (is)_in_them judgment decreed honor he/it to/from_all/each/any/every faithful_his praise master.

↑ 150  Praise master praise god in/on/at/with_sanctuary_his praise_him in_the_firmament mighty_his.
